T02D1373:226b-1: shr'i k'a la tsa kro pa de sha yo ga sha dangga tantra pa nydzi k'a n'a /
T02D1373:226b-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag sbyor ba yan
T02D1373:226b-4: lag drug gi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel zhes bya ba
T02D1373:226b-5: / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1373:226b-6: yod min med min yod med min //
T02D1373:226b-7: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid med pa 'ang min //
T02D1373:226b-8: mu bzhi las ni rnam grol ba //
T02D1373:226b-9: bde chen sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1373:226b-10: dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med las //
T02D1373:226b-11: 'jam pa'i rdo rjes phyung pa yis //
T02D1373:226b-12: sku rnams bzhi yi don bsdus pa //
T02D1373:226b-13: mtshan nyid de ni dgrol bar bya //
T02D1373:226b-14: shes rab thabs min zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T02D1373:226b-15: 'dir shes rab ces bya ba ni cha bco lnga'i bdag nyid dkar po'i phyogs /
T02D1373:226b-16: nag po'i phyogs ni zla ba'i cha zad pa'i phyir na thabs so //
T02D1373:226b-17: de ltar dkar po ni mtshan mo ste /
T02D1373:226b-19: de'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni shes rab las kyang ma yin no //
T02D1373:226b-20: thabs las skyes pa yang ma yin no //
T02D1373:226b-21: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul lo //
T02D1373:226b-22: de ltar yod pa min te /
T02D1373:226b-23: dkar po'i phyogs kyi bde ba zad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:226b-24: med pa yang ni ma yin te /
T02D1373:227a-1: dang po'i dga' ba'i cha'i dngos po ni nag po'i phyogs med pa yin no //
T02D1373:227a-3: 'di dag gnyis ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir //
T02D1373:227a-4: gcig tu 'dus shing lhan cig byed pa med do //
T02D1373:227a-5: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni dkar po'i phyogs yar ngo dang /
T02D1373:227a-6: nag po'i phyogs mar ngo 'di gnyis ka la yang
T02D1373:227a-7: char rtogs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba med
T02D1373:227a-9: mtha' bzhi yongs su rdzogs shing dag pa'i cha bcu
T02D1373:227a-10: drug ma ni stong pa nyid rnam par mi rtog
T02D1373:227a-11: pa spros pa dang bral ba gzung 'dzin med pa'i
T02D1373:227a-12: chos can de ni mu bzhi las grol ba skye
T02D1373:227a-13: / lhan cig skyes pa'i skur brjod do //
T02D1373:227a-14: bde chen sku zhes bya ba ni mchog tu mi
T02D1373:227a-15: 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin su la yod pa de
T02D1373:227a-16: ni he ru ka yin te dus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1373:227a-17: zhes bya'o // phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni
T02D1373:227a-18: de lta bu su la yod pa de la ni
T02D1373:227a-20: ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1373:227a-21: des na shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1373:227a-22: rnal 'byor pa rnams la bzhi pa zad pa'i phyir
T02D1373:227a-23: ro // de ltar na shes rab ma grub pa'o //
T02D1373:227a-24: 'di ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1373:227a-25: gzhan kyi [*gyi] don phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi skur ni 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1373:227a-26: shin tu gnyid mthug po log pa sad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:227a-27: de yang shes rab dang ni thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral zhing /
T02D1373:227a-28: ye shes dang rnam shes dbye ba nyid ces bya
T02D1373:227a-29: ba la 'dir ye shes bya ba ni rnal 'byor
T02D1373:227a-31: rnam par shes pa ni gzhan gyi sems gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1373:227a-32: de'i phyir shes bya'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1373:227a-33: de ltar 'dzin pa'i sems ni shes rab ma ste /
T02D1373:227a-34: rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:227a-35: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi thabs kyi sems ni kun du brtags pa'i snying rje'i mtshan can no //
T02D1373:227a-36: de'i phyir 'dzin pa dang gzung ba'i dbye ba de
T02D1373:227a-37: yis shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin ni gzhan
T02D1373:227a-38: gyi don mdzad pa'i chos sku ste /
T02D1373:227a-39: de yang lhan cig skyes pa las byung ba'o //
T02D1373:227a-40: de ltar rgyu mthun bde ba ni lte bar lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1373:227b-0: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo @227b ni rnam par smin pa yin te /
T02D1373:227b-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1373:227b-3: sgra brnyan lta bur ni sems can du ma'i don
T02D1373:227b-4: mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dir lha'i mig gis
T02D1373:227b-6: ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bu'am /
T02D1373:227b-7: chu'i zla ba lta bu dang po'i gsal ba gang
T02D1373:227b-8: mthong ba de las sgra 'byung ba'i sgra brnyan de
T02D1373:227b-9: ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs
T02D1373:227b-10: kyi ngo bo lha'i snyan gyi rnam par shes pa
T02D1373:227b-12: sgra brnyan ni gzung bya'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:227b-13: de'i phyir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi
T02D1373:227b-14: grangs shes pa ni che ge mo'i rtog pa dang
T02D1373:227b-16: che ge mo'i zla ba dang /
T02D1373:227b-18: che ge mo'i nyi ma la sogs pa la che ge mo 'dir 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
T02D1373:227b-19: de'i sems can so so'i skye bo rnams gdul bar bya ba yin te /
T02D1373:227b-20: de ni rmi lam gyi gnas skabs zad cing med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:227b-21: mgrin pa las skyes bu byed pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T02D1373:227b-22: steng na gnas pa'i sa bon can rnams la yin gyi /
T02D1373:227b-23: sa bon med pa rnams la ni ma yin no //
T02D1373:227b-24: sems can rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du
T02D1373:227b-25: slar yang 'di ru 'gyur ba ni zhes bya ba
T02D1373:227b-26: la sogs pa gsungs pa la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D1373:227b-27: sku dang / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur
T02D1373:227b-28: zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
T02D1373:227b-30: gcig dang du ma sems can rnams kyi sprul pa du ma mthong ba'i phyir du ma'o //
T02D1373:227b-31: de ltar gcig dang du ma'i rnal 'byor ni don
T02D1373:227b-32: dam par ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
T02D1373:227b-33: pa'o // kun rdzob tu ni gcig dang du ma 'gal ba yin te /
T02D1373:227b-34: de yang sad pa'i gnas skabs zad pa'i phyir dpral
T02D1373:227b-35: ba dri ma med par sprul pa'i sku 'thob ste
T02D1373:227b-36: // de yang gzugs rnams thams cad la sna tshogs kun du bde ba ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:227b-37: de ni nor bu chen po rin chen tog ces bya'o //
T02D1373:227b-38: de ltar lhan cig skyes pa gcig pu la ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T02D1373:227b-40: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1373:227b-41: sprul pa'i sku ste sku re re la yang bzhi bzhi'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1373:228a-0: de nyid thams cad kyang sngon du brjod @228a * //
T02D1373:228a-1: ba de nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'di gcig
T02D1373:228a-2: pu dus mtha'i sprin dang 'dra ba'i nyon mongs ba
T02D1373:228a-3: rnams dral zhing med par byas nas he ru kar
T02D1373:228a-4: gyur pa ste zhes bya ba ni mi 'pho ba'i
T02D1373:228a-5: chos kyis nyams su blangs pa'i rnam par shes par
T02D1373:228a-7: he ru ka zhes pa ni drag po rnams ni
T02D1373:228a-8: smin par mdzad pa'i dus rdo rje sems dpa' phyir
T02D1373:228a-9: spro ba'o // rdo rje sems dpa' de yang rmongs pa rnams smin par bya ba'am /
T02D1373:228a-10: dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir ram /
T02D1373:228a-11: de'i don go bar bya ba'i phyir na /
T02D1373:228a-12: de yang dam tshig rgyal sogs zhes bya ba ni
T02D1373:228a-13: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur
T02D1373:228a-15: rin chen 'dzin pa de nyid sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
T02D1373:228a-16: ba rnams la sbyin ba'i don du rin chen 'byung
T02D1373:228a-18: mi 'pho ba'i chos kyi thabs dang shes rab snyoms
T02D1373:228a-19: par 'jug pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'phro
T02D1373:228a-20: bar byed pa zad par byed pa'i tshor ba'i bde
T02D1373:228a-22: de yang padma 'dzin pa chags pa'i rgyur zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:228a-23: de yang snang ba ni sems la bde ba snang ba'o //
T02D1373:228a-24: mi 'khor mi 'phro ba'i chos kyis gang 'phro ba'i
T02D1373:228a-25: bde ba ster ba'i 'du shes te don gzhan ma'o
T02D1373:228a-26: // de yang bgegs rnams gzhom pa'i don du ni /
T02D1373:228a-28: don yod grub pa ru ni 'gyur //
T02D1373:228a-29: zhes bya ba ni mi 'phro ba'i chos kyi 'du byed rnams te /
T02D1373:228a-30: gzhan lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnams
T02D1373:228a-31: gang sgrib pa med pa'i sems su byed pa'i phyir
T02D1373:228a-32: ro // bdud la sogs pa'i sgrib pa rnams gzhom
T02D1373:228a-33: par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi rnam
T02D1373:228a-34: par shes pa la sogs pa phung po lnga dag
T02D1373:228a-36: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis par gsungs so //
T02D1373:228a-37: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te /
T02D1373:228a-38: dang po 'jig rten pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub
T02D1373:228a-39: bsgrub pa ni 'dod khams kyi lha drug tu skye
T02D1373:228a-43: ri lu la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgrubs na 'grub bo //
T02D1373:228b-0: yang rnal 'byor pa rnams @228b kyis rlung dang rtsa
T02D1373:228b-1: dang thig le dang n'a da la sogs pa rtog
T02D1373:228b-2: pa can gyi rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis ni gzugs
T02D1373:228b-3: khams kyi lha bcu bdun du skye bar 'gyur zhing
T02D1373:228b-4: longs spyod khyad par du 'phags pa thob cing thun
T02D1373:228b-5: mong gi dngos grub 'skrub [*sgrub?] pas 'grub pa de
T02D1373:228b-7: de rnams ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ni ma
T02D1373:228b-8: yin no zhes phyag na rdo rje'i stod 'grel dang
T02D1373:228b-9: / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi le'ur
T02D1373:228b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis nges ba'i don du gsungs so
T02D1373:228b-11: / // drang ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1373:228b-12: rgyud kha cig tu bskyed pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas
T02D1373:228b-14: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa rmongs pa
T02D1373:228b-15: mi shes ba rnams la drang ba'i don du gsungs
T02D1373:228b-16: pa yin te / de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1373:228b-17: dbang rab byed du dbang bdun po 'dis sa bdun
T02D1373:228b-18: po thob ces gsungs pa ni byis pa rnams 'jug
T02D1373:228b-20: des pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ma gsungs te /
T02D1373:228b-21: de yang dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud ye shes kyi
T02D1373:228b-22: le'ur zad par sa la sogs pa bzhi bsgoms nas
T02D1373:228b-23: rtogs pa thob na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lhar skye
T02D1373:228b-25: da rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs su bstan to /
T02D1373:228b-27: // / da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten las
T02D1373:228b-28: 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa
T02D1373:228b-29: rnams kyis sbyor ba yan lag drug bsgom par rgyud
T02D1373:228b-30: mtha' dag tu yang gsungs la /
T02D1373:228b-31: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa'i stod 'grel du yang bshad do //
T02D1373:228b-32: yang byang chub sems dpa' padma dkar pos 'grel pa
T02D1373:228b-33: dri ma med par grags par yang rgyas par bshad
T02D1373:228b-34: do // slob dpon zla grags kyis sgron ma gsal
T02D1373:228b-35: bar yang bshad de don go bar yang ma gsungs
T02D1373:228b-36: do // so // de yang 'grel pa dri ma
T02D1373:228b-37: med pa la ba rten nas sbyor ba yan lag
T02D1373:228b-38: drug rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:228b-39: de la dang po so sor spong ba zhes bya
T02D1373:228b-40: ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la so
T02D1373:228b-41: sor spong ba na mig gi dbang po yul rnams
T02D1373:228b-42: las log pa'o // rna ba'i dbang po sgra rnams las log pa'o //
T02D1373:229a-0: sna'i dbang po dri rnams las log @229a * //
T02D1373:229a-2: / lce'i dbang po ro rnams las log pa'o //
T02D1373:229a-3: lus kyi dbang po reg bya 'jam rtsub rnams las
T02D1373:229a-4: log pa ni so sor spong ba'i mtshan nyid do
T02D1373:229a-5: // 'dir so sor spong pa'i sgra ni dang po'i las can gyi rnal 'byor pa'am /
T02D1373:229a-6: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi spyod yul yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1373:229a-7: de yang rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba ni shes bya thams cad 'dzin par byed pa /
T02D1373:229a-8: ye shes kyi phung po yin zhes brjod do //
T02D1373:229a-9: de yang ye shes kyi phung pa'i spyod yul du
T02D1373:229a-10: gyur pa'i mtshan ma'i dbye ba rnam pa bcu gcig
T02D1373:229a-12: de yang dang por so sor spong ba'i dus su lta ba lta bu dang /
T02D1373:229a-13: gnyis pa smig rgyu lta bu dang /
T02D1373:229a-14: gsum pa nam mkha' gsal ba lta bu dang /
T02D1373:229a-15: bzhi pa mar me lta bu dang /
T02D1373:229a-16: lnga pa sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu rnams
T02D1373:229a-17: ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi mar gsungs te
T02D1373:229a-18: / de lta ni so sor spong ba'i mtshan mo'i
T02D1373:229a-19: rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas de rnams mthong bar 'gyur
T02D1373:229a-20: / / de ni so sor spong ba dang po'i bshad pa'o //
T02D1373:229a-21: yang so sor spong ba gnyis pa ni nyin mo'i
T02D1373:229a-22: rnal 'byor gyi sbyor pas mtshan ma rnam pa drug
T02D1373:229a-24: dang po 'bar ba lta bu dang /
T02D1373:229a-25: de nas zla ba shar ba lta bu dang /
T02D1373:229a-26: de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba lta bu dang /
T02D1373:229a-28: de nas glog lta bu ste /
T02D1373:229a-29: de la sgra gcan 'dzin lta bu dang zhes bya
T02D1373:229a-30: ba ni phyi rol sngo bsangs nam mkha'i mdog dang
T02D1373:229a-32: de'i nang du rur ser du gnas pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba lta bu snang ba /
T02D1373:229a-35: de'i nang na thig le lta bu zhes bya ba
T02D1373:229a-36: ni 'od zer 'phro ba lta bu snang ba ni
T02D1373:229a-37: 'od zer lnga'i tshogs gnas pa'i che chung skra'i rtse
T02D1373:229a-38: mo'i tshad tsam du rnal 'byor pas mthong ba ni
T02D1373:229a-39: thig le lta bu ste de ni so sor spong
T02D1373:229a-41: da ni bsam gtan bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:229a-42: de la bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i
T02D1373:229a-43: yul de nyid la sems mi g-yo zhing mi ldog
T02D1373:229a-44: par gnas pa ni bsam gtan dang po'o //
T02D1373:229a-45: yang bsam gtan gnyis pa ni de ltar bsgoms pa'i
T02D1373:229a-46: dbang gis de ltar yang mthong pa'i dbye bas brtags
T02D1373:229a-47: bam yin pa'i mthong ba ni ye shes kyi phung
T02D1373:229b-0: po zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ba'i lus @229b 'di
T02D1373:229b-2: de bzhin du bsam gtan mi bskyod pa zhes bya
T02D1373:229b-3: ba ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam pa
T02D1373:229b-4: bcu yul dang yul can bcu po rnams gcig cing
T02D1373:229b-5: sems phyir mi 'phro bar nang du dbu mar zhugs
T02D1373:229b-6: pa nyed de / sna tshogs pa'i sku ste bsam gtan gnyis pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1373:229b-7: da ni srog dang rtsol ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:229b-8: de la srog ces bya ba ni dbugs phyir 'byung
T02D1373:229b-9: bas kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems zad par byed
T02D1373:229b-10: cing rtsa rnams stongs par byed /
T02D1373:229b-11: rtsol zhes bya ba ni nang du 'byung ba ste mi shor bar byed pa'o //
T02D1373:229b-12: yang gi sgras ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi srog dang rtsol ba 'gog na tshe ring zhes bya'o ;
T02D1373:229b-13: / ral gri can zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi phung po ste /
T02D1373:229b-14: de yang srog dang rtsol bas sna bug g-yon dang /
T02D1373:229b-15: sna bug g-yas pa nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor lnga
T02D1373:229b-16: lnga gcig tu mnyam bar so sor ma 'dres par
T02D1373:229b-17: gyur cing sna bug g-yon pa nas aom dkar por
T02D1373:229b-18: gyur nas nang du 'jug cing lte ba'i h'um la
T02D1373:229b-19: thim pa ni rtsol ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1373:229b-20: h'um las phyir a'a: dmar por gyur nas sna bug
T02D1373:229b-21: g-yon pa nas byung nas sor bcu bdun tshun chad
T02D1373:229b-22: du 'phros pa ni srog ces bya'o //
T02D1373:229b-23: yang srog ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems
T02D1373:229b-24: bde ba'i 'pho bar gyur pa na srog ces bya'o
T02D1373:229b-25: // rtsol ba zhes bya ba ni nang du 'jug
T02D1373:229b-26: pa la yang rnam pa bcur h'um la thim par
T02D1373:229b-27: gnas pa ni rtsol pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1373:229b-28: de yang srog dang rtsol ba yang rnam pa bcur rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis shes par bya'o //
T02D1373:229b-29: de ni srog dang rtsol ba'i bshad pa'o //
T02D1373:229b-30: de ni 'dzin pa bshad pa ni 'dzin pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:229b-31: de la 'dzin pa'i ngo bo brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:229b-32: rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'i phung po nyams su myong ba'o //
T02D1373:229b-33: tshor ba ni bde ba de 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1373:229b-37: gsung gi thig le 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1373:229b-38: thugs kyi thig le 'dzin pa dang ;
T02D1373:229b-39: ye shes kyi thig le 'dzin pa rnams bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnams dang /
T02D1373:229b-43: dpral bar dbang byed kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1373:230a-0: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo rnams su kun rdzob byang chub sems dbu @230a * //
T02D1373:230a-2: 'ong ba'i rang bzhin mi 'pho bar gnas pa ni
T02D1373:230a-3: 'dzin pa'i dbye bas rlung rnam pa bcu 'gro ba
T02D1373:230a-5: de ni 'dzin pa'i yan lag tu brjod de /
T02D1373:230a-7: de ni rjes su dran pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:230a-8: de la dran pa zhes bya ba ni lte ba
T02D1373:230a-9: chos kyi 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor don dam pa byang
T02D1373:230a-10: chub kyi sems gzhom du med pa zhes bya ba
T02D1373:230a-11: gtum mo me'i rnam pa sor gcig pa /
T02D1373:230a-12: phra ba la kha dog dkar mo 'tsher ba 'dod chags kyi mes thams cad gdungs shing sreg pa /
T02D1373:230a-13: lus kun la khyab par byed pa'i nus pa yod
T02D1373:230a-14: pa de las sems kyis rjes su dran pa ni
T02D1373:230a-16: yang shes rab kyi padmar byang chub kyi sems 'dzin
T02D1373:230a-17: pa'i dus su dmigs pa'i yul mi brjed pas na
T02D1373:230a-18: dran pa zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi phung
T02D1373:230a-19: po ste / rlung rnam pa bcu gsang ba'i rdo
T02D1373:230a-20: rje dang padma gnyis gnyis su med cing gcig par
T02D1373:230a-21: gyur ba'i shes rab kyi chags pas bzhu ba'i bde
T02D1373:230a-22: ba de la nyon mongs par mi rtog cing mi
T02D1373:230a-23: chags pa ni dran pa yin te /
T02D1373:230a-24: de yang g-yung mo rjes su dran pa'o //
T02D1373:230a-25: yang dran pa zhes pa ni rtsa dbu ma aa
T02D1373:230a-26: ba dh'u t'ir 'dod pa'i bde ba'i gnas skabs su
T02D1373:230a-27: rlung rnam pa bcu'i dbye bas 'gog nus shing bde
T02D1373:230a-28: ba la mi chags na yang rtsa rjes su dran
T02D1373:230a-29: pa'i dran pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1373:230a-30: rjes su dran pa bshad zin to //
T02D1373:230a-31: da ni ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:230a-32: de la ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba brjod pa la /
T02D1373:230a-33: dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin 'khor lo can zhes bya
T02D1373:230a-34: ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D1373:230a-36: rlung rnam pa bcu gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor 'gog
T02D1373:230a-37: pas na ting nge 'dzin zhes bya bar brjod de
T02D1373:230a-38: / de lta na ni bcom ldan 'das ni mi
T02D1373:230a-39: gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes brjod do
T02D1373:230a-40: / // de ci'i phyir na mya ngan las 'das pa zhes brjod ce na /
T02D1373:230a-41: sangs rgyas rnams ni gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo nas
T02D1373:230a-42: gsang ba bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i par du
T02D1373:230a-43: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1373:230a-44: don dam pa byang chub kyi sems gnyis gnyis su med par gyur cing /
T02D1373:230a-45: stong pa nyid dang snying rje tha mi dad pa
T02D1373:230a-46: las rlung rnam pa bcu rnams rdo rje'i nor bu'i
T02D1373:230a-48: gtsug tor tu rgyas par mdzad pa ni de rnams
T02D1373:230b-0: mi rung @230b ba de la dgongs nas mi gnas
T02D1373:230b-1: par mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang brjod do
T02D1373:230b-3: yang so sor spong ba'i las bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:230b-4: de la so sor spong ba'i las brjod par bya
T02D1373:230b-5: ba ni so sor zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor
T02D1373:230b-6: pa'i lus la phyi'i yul dang /
T02D1373:230b-7: nang gi yul yul can rnam pa bcu rnams kyis
T02D1373:230b-8: 'brel pas rnam par shes pa la mi 'jug cing
T02D1373:230b-9: de nyid la brtan par gyur pa ni so sor
T02D1373:230b-11: spong ba zhes bya ba ni don go bar ma gyur pas yul la mi 'jug pa'o //
T02D1373:230b-12: so sor spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi sku'i yul rnams
T02D1373:230b-13: la mig lnga la sogs pa gzhan mngon par shes
T02D1373:230b-14: pa rnam pa lnga la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1373:230b-15: de ni so sor spong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1373:230b-16: da ni bsam gtan gyi las dang mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:230b-17: de bzhin du yang so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis nang du bdag nyid lta bar bya'o //
T02D1373:230b-18: yang rtog pa zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang du dngos po thams cad la 'dzin par byed /
T02D1373:230b-19: de la dpyod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i don
T02D1373:230b-20: nges par byas zhing de'i rang bzhin khong du chud
T02D1373:230b-21: par byed cing go bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1373:230b-22: dga' ba zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1373:230b-23: sku mthong ba de nyid la zhen par 'gyur bar
T02D1373:230b-25: de la mi g-yo ba'i bde ba zhes bya ba
T02D1373:230b-26: ni sku dang lhan cig tu sems 'dres par gyur
T02D1373:230b-27: nas // me nyams pa la gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyis mi g-yo bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1373:230b-28: de ltar na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dbye bas
T02D1373:230b-29: rlung rnams dang 'dres pa'i bsam gtan rnam pa bcu
T02D1373:230b-31: de ni bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1373:230b-32: de ltar so sor spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1373:230b-33: bsam gtan gyi mchan nyid bshad zin to //
T02D1373:230b-34: da ni srog dang rtsol ba'i las dang mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:230b-35: de la srog ces bya ba ni sna bug g-yon
T02D1373:230b-36: ba dang g-yas pa gnyis nas gcig la gcig car
T02D1373:230b-37: du rgyun mi 'chad par rgyu ba ni srog gi
T02D1373:230b-38: las so // srog gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba
T02D1373:230b-39: ni rang bzhin gyis dbu mar dbugs bcu gcig dang
T02D1373:230b-40: bzhi cha rgyus nas bde ba bskyed pa ni srog
T02D1373:230b-42: rtsol ba zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa dang g-yas
T02D1373:230b-43: pa'i sna bug nas nang du 'jug cing gnas pa
T02D1373:231a-0: rtsol ba'i mtshan nyid ni g-yon pa dang g-yas @231a * //
T02D1373:231a-1: pa'i sna bug nas rgyu ba'i srog 'gog cing dbus
T02D1373:231a-2: ma'i lam du 'jug pa'i rtsol ba'i mtshan nyid do
T02D1373:231a-3: // de ltar rlung rnam pa bcu ste /
T02D1373:231a-4: nam mkha' dang sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa bcu rtsa dbus mar 'gog par byed /
T02D1373:231a-5: des ni srog dang rtsol ba'i las dang mtshan nyid bshad zin to /
T02D1373:231a-7: // / da ni thig le'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:231a-8: 'dir thig ces bya ba ni shes bya'i dngos po gtan la 'bebs pa ste /
T02D1373:231a-9: dngos po mi 'gyur bar byed pa'o //
T02D1373:231a-10: le zhes bya ba ni dpral ba'i dbus su phug rdugs kyi rtsa srog gi rlung bcug cing /
T02D1373:231a-11: bla ma'i man ngag ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas
T02D1373:231a-12: sngar rtsa ma nyams pa rnams rnal 'byor gyi stobs
T02D1373:231a-13: kyis rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su thig
T02D1373:231a-14: le rgyas shing thams cad khyab par byed pa ni
T02D1373:231a-16: de ni thig le'i mtshan nyid bshad zin to //
T02D1373:231a-17: da ni dang gi sgras thig le bshad do //
T02D1373:231a-18: da ni yang 'dzin pa bshad par bye ste /
T02D1373:231a-20: zhes bya ba ni sna bug g-yon pa dang g-yas
T02D1373:231a-21: pa'i rlung rgyu ba ni byis pa so so'i skye
T02D1373:231a-24: 'pho ba'i bde ba la chags shing zhen pa dang
T02D1373:231a-25: bcas pa ni 'khor bar yang skye ba'i las rab
T02D1373:231a-26: tu bsags shing de'i dbang gis ngan song gsum du
T02D1373:231a-27: ltung zhing dmyal bar skye ba ni 'jigs pa'o //
T02D1373:231a-28: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni dpral pa srid pa'i
T02D1373:231a-29: gnas su 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i srog gi rlung
T02D1373:231a-30: bkag pas ni gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo na rtsa
T02D1373:231a-31: chen po bzhi gnas pa ni 'byung ba bzhi las
T02D1373:231a-32: grub pa dra ba'i dpe dang 'dra bar byas nas
T02D1373:231a-34: rtsa lus thams cad la dra ba ltar khyab nas gnas pa'o //
T02D1373:231a-36: dra ba nas mar zhugs nas lus thams cad la
T02D1373:231a-37: bde bas khyab par byed cing bde bas mnyam pa'o
T02D1373:231a-38: // yang srog gi rlung gis kyang thams cad la khyab par gnas pa'o ;
T02D1373:231a-40: thams cad la tshor ba mnyam du skye zhing rul
T02D1373:231a-41: ba dang skams pa med pa ni srog gi rlung
T02D1373:231a-42: thams cad la khyab par gnas so //
T02D1373:231a-43: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa ni rtsa'i dra ba nas
T02D1373:231a-44: mar thig le bzhis lus thams cad la khyab par
T02D1373:231b-0: gnas shing lus bde ba dang bcas @231b shing gsal
T02D1373:231b-1: ba mi rtog pa bsgoms pas ni srid pa'i rtse
T02D1373:231b-2: mo las gyen du skyod par byed cing thams cad
T02D1373:231b-3: man ngag khyad par can rnams 'dzin to //
T02D1373:231b-4: yang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid ni dpral bar srog 'gog pa dang /
T02D1373:231b-5: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor srog gi rlung 'gag pa dang /
T02D1373:231b-6: rdo rje'i rtsa bar sems rtse gcig par gyur pas
T02D1373:231b-7: byang chub kyi sems mi 'pho ba'i bde ba 'dzin
T02D1373:231b-8: par byed pas na 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid ces brjod
T02D1373:231b-9: do // des na 'dzin pa'i las dang mtshan nyid bshad zin to //
T02D1373:231b-10: da ni yang rjes su dran pa'i las dang mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:231b-11: de la gtum mo zhes bya ba ni mi srun pa'o ;
T02D1373:231b-12: / yang na shin tu kun la khro ba'i rang bzhin can ni gtum mo'o //
T02D1373:231b-13: dpe de lta bu'i rang bzhin ni shes rab kyi
T02D1373:231b-14: bya gdong ma la yon tan yod pas gtum mo
T02D1373:231b-16: yang nyon mongs pa rnams mi skye ba'i nus pa yod pas na gtum mo'o //
T02D1373:231b-17: yang shin tu myur ba'i yon tan nam //
T02D1373:231b-18: drag por gcod pa'i yon tan nam //
T02D1373:231b-19: myur du smin par byed pa'i rang bzhin nam //
T02D1373:231b-20: dngos po thams cad brjod pa'am //
T02D1373:231b-21: dmigs pa med par byed pas na gtum mo ste dran pa'i las so //
T02D1373:231b-22: dran pa'i mtshan nyid de ni 'jig rten gsum po thams cad du snang bar byed pa'o //
T02D1373:231b-23: srid pa gsum gyi nam mkha' la 'phags par byed
T02D1373:231b-24: cing mi g-yo bar gyur pas na gtum mo dug
T02D1373:231b-26: de rnams dran pas na dran pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1373:231b-27: des ni rjes su dran pa bcur bstan pa'o //
T02D1373:231b-28: da ni ting nge 'dzin gyi las dang mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:231b-29: de la thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1373:231b-30: zhes bya ba ni shes bya dang ye shes ro
T02D1373:231b-31: gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'i yul thams cad 'gag
T02D1373:231b-32: par 'gyur ba / spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba
T02D1373:231b-33: sems mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gis chos kyi
T02D1373:231b-34: sku nam mkha' la sprin dang sa pa lta bu'i
T02D1373:231b-35: sems gsal ba rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:231b-36: de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi las so //
T02D1373:231b-37: ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid ni ye shes kyi
T02D1373:231b-38: sku de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis rnyed
T02D1373:231b-39: par 'gyur ro // de yang srog gi rlung rnam
T02D1373:231b-40: pa bcu la sogs pa rnal 'byor pas 'gags pa'am
T02D1373:232a-0: par 'gyur ro // / med par gyur cing sems mi g-yo bar gyur pas @232a * //
T02D1373:232a-1: mthong zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu
T02D1373:232a-2: gnyis par bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'i don du
T02D1373:232a-3: gsungs so // des ni ting nge 'dzin gyi las dang mtshan nyid bshad zin to //
T02D1373:232a-4: de yan chad sbyor ba yan lag drug gi dbye ba dang mtshan nyid dang las rnams bstan nas /
T02D1373:232a-5: da ni yon tan brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:232a-6: de ltar sbyor ba yan lag drug gsungs pa'i sgrub thabs te /
T02D1373:232a-7: 'di ni chu sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D1373:232a-8: gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1373:232a-9: sna tshogs bdag po'i sgrub thabs ni //
T02D1373:232a-10: dus kyi 'khor lo de rig go //
T02D1373:232a-11: phyag rgya gsum dang tshad gsum gyi //
T02D1373:232a-12: rnam pa gsum gyi 'gro dbang gis //
T02D1373:232a-13: rnal 'byor rnams la thar ster ro //
T02D1373:232a-14: de la chu sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D1373:232a-15: zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya chos dang ldan pa lo bcu gnyis ma'am /
T02D1373:232a-18: ye shes kyi phyag rgya lha mo'am /
T02D1373:232a-20: mi mo gang la mos pa'am /
T02D1373:232a-24: gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1373:232a-26: las kyi phyag rgya lo bcu gnyis ma la sogs
T02D1373:232a-27: pa la brten nas bde ba la sems gtad cing
T02D1373:232a-28: dmigs pa yis ni byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pas
T02D1373:232a-29: ni 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ba'i bde ba tshad chung
T02D1373:232a-30: ngur 'gyur te / de'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu
T02D1373:232a-31: ni las kyi phyag rgya la brten nas rnal 'byor
T02D1373:232a-32: pas bsgrubs pas 'dzag pa'i bde ba chung ngu chu'i
T02D1373:232a-33: yon tan zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang
T02D1373:232a-34: dga' ba sum 'gyur du 'byung ba des ni 'dod
T02D1373:232a-35: khams kyi lha'i longs spyod dang rgyan dang 'khor khyad
T02D1373:232a-36: par can thob par gyur pa ni phan yon dang
T02D1373:232a-37: ngur 'gyur te / bo'o // yang ye shes kyi
T02D1373:232a-38: phyag rgya ni lha mo la sogs pa dmigs pa'i
T02D1373:232a-39: yul du byas nas sems bde ba la gtad nas
T02D1373:232a-40: bde ba skyed pa ni chu'i yon tan zhes pa
T02D1373:232a-41: ni bde ba 'jig rten pa dang bde ba bzhi
T02D1373:232a-42: 'gyur du 'byung ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i 'bab pa'i
T02D1373:232a-43: 'gro ba ni bde ba'i tshad 'bring por 'gyur te
T02D1373:232a-44: ngur 'gyur te / bo'o // / des dngos grub
T02D1373:232a-45: kyi 'bras bu ni ye shes kyi phyag rgyal brten
T02D1373:232a-46: nas rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pa ni gzugs khams kyi
T02D1373:232a-47: lha bcu bdun gyi bde ba'am /
T02D1373:232a-48: longs spyod dang rgyan dang 'khor khyad par can rnams
T02D1373:232b-0: skye ba @232b gcig gis thob par 'gyur zhes dpal
T02D1373:232b-1: dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi le'ur gsungs te
T02D1373:232b-2: / de ni bsod nams kyi tshogs khyad par can yin gyis /
T02D1373:232b-3: ye shes kyi tshogs khyad par can ni ma yin zhes de la 'byung ngo //
T02D1373:232b-5: phyag rgya chen po stong pa nyid dang snying rje
T02D1373:232b-6: dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgya chen mo la dmigs
T02D1373:232b-7: pa'i bde ba bskyed pa ni mi 'bab pa'i bde
T02D1373:232b-8: ba chen po de ni rnal 'byor mchog gi yang
T02D1373:232b-10: sa'i yon tan zhes pa ni lnga 'gyur du 'byung
T02D1373:232b-11: ba'i bde ba des ni skad cig gcam yid la
T02D1373:232b-12: byas kyang srid pa las gyen du gshegs so zhes
T02D1373:232b-14: dper na nags chen po dpag tu med pa yod
T02D1373:232b-15: kyang gtsub shing las byung ba'i me shin tu chung
T02D1373:232b-16: yang nags de rnams me des thams cad sreg pa
T02D1373:232b-17: dang mtshungs te / lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes kyi sgrib pa'am /
T02D1373:232b-18: bag chags dpag tu med pa yod kyang ;
T02D1373:232b-19: stong pa nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge
T02D1373:232b-20: 'dzin la rtog pa thams cad spangs nas thun gcig
T02D1373:232b-21: bsgoms nas dag par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D1373:232b-22: kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs te /
T02D1373:232b-24: de yang phyag rgya chen pos ni bsod nams dang
T02D1373:232b-25: ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis ga'i 'bras bu dang bde
T02D1373:232b-27: de ltar phyag rgya gsum la rnal 'byor pas bsgoms
T02D1373:232b-28: pas dngos grub kyang gsum du de ltar 'byung bar
T02D1373:232b-29: 'gyur ro // sna tshogs brtan pa'i sgrub thabs ni
T02D1373:232b-30: dus kyi 'khor los de rig go zhes bya ba
T02D1373:232b-31: ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba yan lag drug
T02D1373:232b-32: bsgom par bya zhes gsungs te /
T02D1373:232b-33: rnal 'byor bas sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya ba'i
T02D1373:232b-34: don du sbyor ba yan lag drug bsgom par bya
T02D1373:232b-35: ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1373:232b-36: phyag rgya gsum dang zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1373:232b-37: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1373:232b-38: phyag rgya chen po dang gsum la brten nas bsgom pa'o //
T02D1373:232b-39: tshad gsum dang zhes bya ba ni skyes bu blo dman pa dang /
T02D1373:232b-41: skyes bu blo rtsal rab tu phyin pa rnams la phyag rgya gsum ci rigs par sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1373:232b-42: dang ge sgras ni phyag rgya gsum las mi 'pho bar nyams su long shig par bstan pa'o //
T02D1373:233a-2: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gsum gyis snga ma'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T02D1373:233a-3: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T02D1373:233a-4: da ltar gyi sh'akya thub pa yang de la brten nas sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1373:233a-5: rnal 'byor rnams la thar ster ro //
T02D1373:233a-6: zhes bya ba ni de ltar phyag rgyas gsum la
T02D1373:233a-7: brten nas bsgrubs na zhi ba dang grol ba'i rgyur
T02D1373:233a-8: 'gyur zhing chos kyi skur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1373:233a-9: to // so sor spong ba la sogs pa'i phan yon bshad zin to //
T02D1373:233a-10: da ni so sor sdud pa'i 'bras bu bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:233a-11: de la 'dir so sor sdud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum ste /
T02D1373:233a-12: 'dir rnal 'byor bas mtshan mo bsgoms pa'i dus su so sor sdud pa yang dag par 'gyur te /
T02D1373:233a-13: stong pa nyid kyi sku la brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D1373:233a-14: rnal 'byor ba la sngags thams cad kyis byin gyis
T02D1373:233a-15: brlabs pas tshig gis mchog ster ba zhes bya ba
T02D1373:233a-16: ni ngag gi smra ba thams cad btsun pa dang
T02D1373:233a-17: / tsi smras pa kun yang sems can rnams la snyan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:233a-18: longs spyod dang yo byad thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:233a-19: des ni so sor sdud pa'i 'bras bu brjod de bshad zin to //
T02D1373:233a-20: da ni bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:233a-22: bsam gtan sbyor ba dag pa yis //
T02D1373:233a-23: mngon par shes pa lnga po ni //
T02D1373:233a-24: thob par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag / ces bya ba gsungs pa la /
