T02D1373:236b-16: a'a: yang phyir 'byung ba aom dang mnyam par je thung je thung du bsam mo //
T02D1373:236b-17: phyi nas sna bug gnyis 'dom pa'i mtshams su sor
T02D1373:236b-18: bzhi'i nang nas thig le gsum gnas par bsams la
T02D1373:236b-19: / des dbugs la phog pas dbugs slar log nas
T02D1373:236b-20: h'um la thim par gyur pas bde ba dang bcas
T02D1373:236b-22: mar 'gro bas sna bug gi sum mdor thig le
T02D1373:236b-23: gsum ni kha dang sna bug gnyis su re re
T02D1373:236b-24: gnas pas srog gi rlung la phog pas srog gi
T02D1373:236b-25: rlung phyir log pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa
T02D1373:236b-26: dang 'dres nas don dam pa byang chub kyi sems
T02D1373:236b-27: sor gcig ba la h'um dang dbugs su bcas pa
T02D1373:236b-28: thim par gyur pa ni srog nye bar sgrub pa'o
T02D1373:236b-29: // nye bar sgrub pa bshad zin to //
T02D1373:236b-30: da ni sgrub pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:236b-31: shes rab las spros zla ba'i thig le zhes bya
T02D1373:236b-32: ba ni 'dir shes rab kyi chags pas zhu ba'i
T02D1373:236b-33: rnal 'byor pa'i thig le de ni spros pa'i zla
T02D1373:236b-35: de yang shes rab las spros pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1373:236b-36: sems kyi thig le de yang rnal 'byor pa'i rdo
T02D1373:236b-37: rje nor bu'i nang du son pa'i bde ba gang
T02D1373:236b-38: yin pa de ni yi ge bzhi'i bdag nyid de
T02D1373:236b-39: / gsang ba bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor ye
T02D1373:236b-40: shes kyi rang bzhin gyi yi ge ho dmar po
T02D1373:236b-41: / dang / lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor a'a: dmar skya dang /
T02D1373:236b-42: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor yi ge h'um dkar po dang /
T02D1373:236b-43: longs spyod kyi 'khor lor aom rnams kha sbyor du
T02D1373:236b-44: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par sgrub pa
T02D1373:236b-46: 'di ni sgrub pa'i yan lag gsum par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:237a-0: @237a * // des ni sgrub pa bshad zin to //
T02D1373:237a-1: da ni sgrub pa chen po brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:237a-2: bde ba ma nyams gcig zhi ba //
T02D1373:237a-3: zhes bya ni las kyi phyag rgya nu ma dang
T02D1373:237a-4: skra dang ldan pa lo bcu gnyis ma la sogs
T02D1373:237a-5: pa yang rung / ye shes kyi phyag rgya gang
T02D1373:237a-6: la dmigs pa de brtan por gyur pa yang rung
T02D1373:237a-7: pa yang rung / / phyag rgya chen po stong
T02D1373:237a-8: pa nyid la dmigs pa brtan por gyur kyang rung
T02D1373:237a-9: pa yang rung / / ste / byang chub kyi
T02D1373:237a-10: sems kyi bde ba mi nyams pa'i skad cig ma
T02D1373:237a-11: gcig gi mtshan nyid de ni lus zhi ba dang
T02D1373:237a-12: pa yang rung / / ste / / ngag zhi ba dang /
T02D1373:237a-14: ye shes zhi ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1373:237a-15: de ni lhan cig skyes pa yin zhes bcom ldan
T02D1373:237a-16: 'das kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud dpal mchog gi dang po
T02D1373:237a-17: zhes bya ba stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i ye shes
T02D1373:237a-19: sgrub chen ye shes sbyor ba'o //
T02D1373:237a-20: zhes bya ba ni don dam pa byang chub kyi
T02D1373:237a-21: sems de la rnal 'byor pas dus thams cad du
T02D1373:237a-22: byang chub kyi sems mi 'dzag pa'i bde ba'i rgyun
T02D1373:237a-23: gnas shing ; rtog pa can gyi bde ba'i rgyun
T02D1373:237a-24: med do snyam pa'i shes pa dang lhan cig tu
T02D1373:237a-25: rnal 'byor pas gcig par bsgom pa ni sgrub pa
T02D1373:237a-26: chen po'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o //
T02D1373:237a-27: de ltar ye shes kyi yan lag bzhi pa sgrub pa chen po bshad zin to //
T02D1373:237a-28: da ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dbu ma chen po brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:237a-29: lha la sogs pa sgrub pa sngar bshad pa'i bskyed
T02D1373:237a-30: pa'i rim pa ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thob
T02D1373:237a-31: pa'o // rdzogs pa'i rim pa de kho na nyid
T02D1373:237a-32: sgrub pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub
T02D1373:237a-33: pa'o // thob pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02D1373:237a-34: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan la //
T02D1373:237a-35: bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten //
T02D1373:237a-36: 'jig rten kun rdzob brten pa dang //
T02D1373:237a-37: don dam pa yi bden pas 'grub //
T02D1373:237a-38: ces bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nges pa'i don to //
T02D1373:237a-39: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las /
T02D1373:237a-40: rim pa gnyis pa yang dag brten //
T02D1373:237a-41: rdo rje can gyis bdag la bstan //
T02D1373:237a-42: bskyed pa'i rim pa gcig yin te //
T02D1373:237a-43: gzhan ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1373:237a-45: de'i phyir na de ltar lha sgrub pa la ni
T02D1373:237a-46: rnam par rtog pa can gyi bskyed pa'i rim pa
T02D1373:237a-47: rnal 'byor bsgom pa rnams kyis thams cad bsgrubs pas
T02D1373:237b-0: de kho @237b na nyid kyi rang bzhin chos kyi
T02D1373:237b-1: sku sgrub pa la ni rnam par rtog pa dkar
T02D1373:237b-23: dbyibs kyi tha snyad thams cad dang bral ba'i yan
T02D1373:237b-24: lag bzhi rdzogs pa dang gis 'grub pa'o zhes bya
T02D1373:237b-25: ba ni rang gi rigs pas 'grub pa'o //
T02D1373:237b-26: dbu ma chen po'i don bshad zin to //
T02D1373:237b-27: da ni srog dang rtsol ba'i yon tan dang skyon gnyis yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:237b-28: srog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1373:237b-29: 'di ltar rnal 'byor pas rnam par mi rtog pa
T02D1373:237b-30: bsgoms pa las sku mthong nas rnal 'byor pas rdo
T02D1373:237b-31: rje dril bu'i rtse mo nas brtsams nas gtsug tor
T02D1373:237b-32: gyi 'khor lo'i bar du sems gtad cing dbugs sum
T02D1373:237b-33: stong drug brgya'i bar du 'gog cing bde ba nyams
T02D1373:237b-34: su myong bar bya ba ni yon tan du 'gyur
T02D1373:237b-35: ro // skyon du 'gyur ba ni rnal 'byor pas dbugs shin tu gsang bas sna rtser ram /
T02D1373:237b-36: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor cig car bsdams shing
T02D1373:237b-37: mi rgyu bar byas na ni srog gi rlung yan
T02D1373:237b-38: man du 'gro sa med de lte bar brgyal bas
T02D1373:237b-39: srog gzhan du mi 'gyur bar aa wa dh'u t'ir
T02D1373:237b-40: zhugs nas tshangs pa'i bu ga nas byung nas /
T02D1373:237b-41: rnal 'byor pa'i lus dor nas mgo bkas te 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:237b-43: rnal 'byor pas mgo na bar mi byed pa de srid du rnal 'byor du bya'o //
T02D1373:237b-44: de ltar byas na rnal 'byor pa rnams la mnyam
T02D1373:237b-45: pa'i bde ba phung po nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu
T02D1373:237b-47: de la steng bu zhes pa ni mgo po de srid na mi 'dod pa yin te /
T02D1373:237b-48: rnal 'byor pas dmigs pa mi bya'o //
T02D1373:237b-49: byas na ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa ster bar 'gyur te /
T02D1373:237b-51: 'on te rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis gtsug tor gyi
T02D1373:237b-52: 'khor lo'i sgo phug nas srog gi rlung 'gro ba'i
T02D1373:237b-53: rnal 'byor pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde
T02D1373:237b-54: ba go 'phang stong pa nyid kyi sku la gcig
T02D1373:237b-55: tu sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la sems rtse
T02D1373:238a-0: @238a * // kyang / med pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1373:238a-1: yod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1373:238a-2: de ji ltar yod ce na /
T02D1373:238a-3: rnal 'byor pa ni ma nyams pa'i bde ba mchog
T02D1373:238a-4: tu mi 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin du 'gro bar
T02D1373:238a-5: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D1373:238a-6: gang du yang ma grub pa'i chos kyi skur 'gyur
T02D1373:238a-8: 'on te rnal 'byor pa chos kyi skur 'gyur ram /
T02D1373:238a-9: gzhan zhig tu 'gyur snyam pa la /
T02D1373:238a-11: rnal 'byor pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1373:238a-12: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i sems nyid chos kyi skur 'gyur ba la /
T02D1373:238a-13: rnal 'byor pa 'gro zhes brjod par zad kyis /
T02D1373:238a-14: rnal 'byor pa'i lus po 'gro ba ni ma yin no //
T02D1373:238a-15: 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams la grags pa med
T02D1373:238a-16: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa 'di ni shi
T02D1373:238a-17: bar gyur to zhes grags par 'gyur te /
T02D1373:238a-18: shi ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni grub mtha' 'dzin pa rnams la rigs pa grub pa'o //
T02D1373:238a-19: srog dang rtsol ba'i skyon dang yon tan bstan pa
T02D1373:238a-20: sgrub thabs kyi le'ur bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
T02D1373:238a-22: skyon dang yon tan gnyis bshad zin to //
T02D1373:238a-23: 'bras bu srog ces pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1373:238a-24: da ni rtsa'i kun du spyod pa'i gnas thabs brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:238a-25: thig le zhes pa ni dpral bar sku'i thig le gnyid sad pa'i gnas skabs skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D1373:238a-26: ma zhes pa ni mgrin par gsung gi thig le
T02D1373:238a-27: rmi lam rmis pa lta bu'i gnas skabs skyed par
T02D1373:238a-28: byed pa'o // sgra zhes bya ba ni snying gar
T02D1373:238a-29: sems kyi thig le shin tu gnyid log pa lta
T02D1373:238a-31: ye shes zhes pa ni lte bar ye shes kyi
T02D1373:238a-32: thig le bzhi pa'i gnas skabs skyed par byed pa'o
T02D1373:238a-33: // bdud rtsi'i gnas su song ba ni lu gu
T02D1373:238a-34: rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa de la yang bdud rtsi'i
T02D1373:238a-35: gnas su zhes bya ba ni dpral ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1373:238a-37: song ba ni zhes pa ni de ru'o //
T02D1373:238a-38: dus kyi me zhes pa ni ye shes kyi rtsar song ba ni bdud rtsi'i gnas su song ba'o //
T02D1373:238a-39: lu gu rgyud ces bya ba ni g-yon gyi rtsa la la n'a dang /
T02D1373:238a-40: g-yas pa'i rtsa ra sa n'a'o //
T02D1373:238b-0: bcings pa'i rtsa zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi rtsa @238b aa ba dh'u t'ir dang /
T02D1373:238b-1: de'i nang gi ye shes kyi rtsar me kha dog dmar por gnas pa ni bcings pa'o //
T02D1373:238b-2: de ci ltar bcings she na /
T02D1373:238b-7: ye shes kyi sgrib pa rnams kyis lus gsal ba dang /
T02D1373:238b-10: ye shes gsal bar gyur pa shel sgong phyis pa ltar gsal ba'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1373:238b-11: dar gyi srin bus bdag nyid kun nas dkris shing mi thar ba de bzhin du /
T02D1373:238b-12: 'gro ba rnams kyang sgrib pa bzhis mi gsal bar byas so //
T02D1373:238b-13: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis de rtogs par byas shing /
T02D1373:238b-14: lu gu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa ni lus dang /
T02D1373:238b-18: zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams yin pas /
T02D1373:238b-19: ye shes dkris shing mi gsal bar byas so //
T02D1373:238b-20: des dkris pa ni lte ba dang /
T02D1373:238b-21: snying ga'i bar du lan gsum du dkris so //
T02D1373:238b-22: de nas yang aa ba dh'u t'i ni snying gi
T02D1373:238b-23: ze'u 'bru'i dbus nas byung nas 'gro zhing srog gi
T02D1373:238b-25: la la n'a ni g-yon nas 'gro'o //
T02D1373:238b-26: ra sa n'a ni g-yas nas snying ga'i padma'i 'dab ma'i g-yas nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:238b-28: mgrin pa'i padma'i 'dab ma'i bar du lan gsum du 'khyil nas yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:238b-29: de bzhin du yang mgrin pa dang //
T02D1373:238b-30: dpral ba'i dbus su lan gsum du 'khyil nas gnas pa'o //
T02D1373:238b-31: dpral ba nas gtsug tor gyi bar du lan gsum du 'khyil nas gnas te /
T02D1373:238b-37: snying stobs gsum gyi rang bzhin gyis de ltar lan gsum pa bzhir byas nas /
T02D1373:238b-38: lus kyi rtsi'i ra sa n'a g-yas kyi rtsa sna bu gnas phyir byung ba ni /
T02D1373:238b-39: bcu gnyis mtha' nas cha yi mthar //
T02D1373:238b-40: zhes pa ni sa'i khams kyi rlung sor bcu gsum du rgyu'o //
T02D1373:238b-41: chu'i khams kyi rlung sor bcu bzhir rgyu'o //
T02D1373:238b-42: me'i khams kyi rlung sor bco lngar rgyu'o //
T02D1373:238b-43: rlung gi khams kyi rlung sor bcu drug tu rgyu'o //
T02D1373:238b-44: nam mkha'i khams kyi rlung sor bcu bdun du rgyu'o zhes ni nang gi le'ur gsungs so //
T02D1373:238b-45: sku'i g-yon gyi rtsa la la n'a ni sor bcu bdun nas rgyu'o //
T02D1373:239a-0: @239a * // ngag gi rtsa ra sa n'a ni g-yas nas sor bcu gsum tshun chad du 'gro'o //
T02D1373:239a-1: yid kyi rtsa aa ba dh'u t'i cig car dbus
T02D1373:239a-2: ma nas sna bug gnyis 'dom pa nas sor bco
T02D1373:239a-4: de bzhin du 'og tu lte ba dang /
T02D1373:239a-5: gsang ba'i gnas kyi bar du yang lan gsum du 'khyil bar byas nas /
T02D1373:239a-6: bshang ba'i rtsa ni g-yas nas 'gro'o //
T02D1373:239a-7: gci ba'i rtsa ni g-yon nas 'gro'o //
T02D1373:239a-8: dung can ma ni dbus ma nas gsang ba'i rdo
T02D1373:239a-9: rje'i nang nas shes rab kyi padma'i bya gdong mar
T02D1373:239a-10: 'gro'o // gsang ba'i padma'i 'og tu bshad pa'i rtsa dbus su 'gro'o //
T02D1373:239a-11: gsang ba'i rdo rje dang shes rab kyi padma'i g-yon nas gci ba'i rtsa 'gro'o //
T02D1373:239a-12: g-yas kyi rtsa ra sa n'a na sa kun rdzob
T02D1373:239a-13: byang chub kyi sems kyi khu ba 'gro'o zhes pa
T02D1373:239a-14: ni rtsi'i kun du spyod pa yin te /
T02D1373:239a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhib mor ni nang gi le'ur gsungs te 'dir ma bshad do //
T02D1373:239a-16: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'i nges pa'o //
T02D1373:239a-17: rtsa'i kun du spyod pa bshad zin to //
T02D1373:239a-18: da ni rlung gnyis rgyu ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:239a-19: srog dang thur sel lan gsum rgyu //
T02D1373:239a-20: zhes bya ba ni steng du lus dang /
T02D1373:239a-21: ngag dang yid gsum gyi rang bzhin g-yon dang /
T02D1373:239a-23: dbus ma nas gyen du rgyu ba srog gi rlung ngo //
T02D1373:239a-26: snying stobs kyi rang bzhin bshad pa dang /
T02D1373:239a-28: khu ba'i rtsa'i lam nas rgyu bar byed pa'i rlung ni thur du sel ba'o //
T02D1373:239a-29: rdo rjer bcas pa'i padma ni shes rab rnams kyi skye gnas te /
T02D1373:239a-30: 'bab pa'i bde ba ster ba'i phyir ro ;
T02D1373:239a-31: / nor bu dang bcas pa'i rdo rje ni 'dzin pa'i bde ba ster ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:239a-32: bud med kyi padma dang ldan pa nyid do //
T02D1373:239a-33: padma'i ze 'bru 'byed pa nyid yin no //
T02D1373:239a-34: dbus su rlung dang phrad pa ni lte ba'i dbus
T02D1373:239a-35: su gyen du rgyu ba'i sreg gi rlung dang thur
T02D1373:239a-36: du sel ba'i rlung dag phrad pa'o //
T02D1373:239a-37: bya gdong ma dang dung can ma gnyis phan tshun du mi g-yo bar phrad de /
T02D1373:239a-38: byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa gnyis rdo rje sbu
T02D1373:239a-39: gu'i nang du padma'i ge sar zhugs pas mi 'pho
T02D1373:239a-40: ba'o // yul zhes pa ni shes rab ma'i padma'o //
T02D1373:239a-41: yul can zhes pa ni thabs kyi rdo rje'i nor bu'o //
T02D1373:239b-0: rnam par dbye ba med @239b ces pa ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med cing mi phyed pa'o //
T02D1373:239b-1: yul rnam la yul can rnams te mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i sgo mi 'jug pa ste /
T02D1373:239b-3: 'jug pa zhes pa ni lte ba'i padma'i srog gi rlung 'jug pa'o //
T02D1373:239b-4: sems mi g-yo ba de ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D1373:239b-5: du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni aa
T02D1373:239b-6: ba dh'u t'ir srog gi rlung chung ba'i sgo nas
T02D1373:239b-7: 'dzin pa'o // yang gi sgras ni srog de nyid
T02D1373:239b-8: lte bar gzhom du med pa la thim par gyur
T02D1373:239b-9: 'dzin pa'o // ba'o // 'di dag thams cad byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnal 'byor pa'am /
T02D1373:239b-10: rnal 'byor ma rnams la gsang zhes pa ni byis
T02D1373:239b-11: pa so so'i skye bo rnam par mi shes pa
T02D1373:239b-13: dad pa shas chung zhing nyon mongs pa shas che
T02D1373:239b-14: ba rnams la gsang ba zhes bya ba ni sba
T02D1373:239b-15: bar bya'o // de rnams la ma sbas pa yin na rang yang dmyal bar ltung la /
T02D1373:239b-16: gzhan la yang de la brten nas dmyal bar 'gro
T02D1373:239b-17: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nges pa'o
T02D1373:239b-18: // rlung gnyis kyi rgyu ba bshad zin to //
T02D1373:239b-19: da ni dkyil 'khor lnga'i zad pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:239b-20: sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1373:239b-21: 'dir gal te khro bo'i lta bas stong pa la
T02D1373:239b-22: sems gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pa mig ma btsums par
T02D1373:239b-23: gyur pa de lta na ni g-yon pa'am /
T02D1373:239b-24: g-yas par te sa zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1373:239b-25: gal te g-yas par sa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab pa'i dus
T02D1373:239b-26: su rnal 'byor pa sgom par byed pa de lta
T02D1373:239b-27: na ni / cho ga 'di yin gyi g-yon gyi rtsar 'bab pa'i dus su ni ma yin te /
T02D1373:239b-28: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:239b-29: de'i phyir g-yon pa'am g-yas par /
T02D1373:239b-30: gang srog gi dkyil 'khor 'bab pa de'i chos can gyi phyir de nyid dkyil 'khor du brjod do //
T02D1373:239b-31: de'i phyir g-yas kyi rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor las srog gi chu'i dkyil 'khor du 'gro ste /
T02D1373:239b-32: de ltar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du'o //
T02D1373:239b-33: g-yon gyi rtsa las ni nam mkha' la sogs par 'gro ste /
T02D1373:239b-35: mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur //
T02D1373:239b-36: zhes pa ni du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
T02D1373:239b-37: rnam pa kun ldan gyi stong gzugs su 'gyur ro
T02D1373:240a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes de nyid do //
T02D1373:240a-3: ye shes las rdzu 'phrul zhes pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1373:240a-4: dngos grub ces pa ni khams gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur te /
T02D1373:240a-5: mi rnams skye ba 'di nyid la //
T02D1373:240a-6: thob par 'gyur ro mi bdag kye //
T02D1373:240a-7: zhes bya ba ste lam du zhugs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1373:240a-8: da ni rang gi sems 'di snang ba la 'jug pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:240a-9: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02D1373:240a-10: 'di ltar bka' gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa dang /
T02D1373:240a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg par
T02D1373:240a-12: ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ni rnal 'byor pa rnam
T02D1373:240a-13: pa gnyis la goms par bya zhes gsungs te /
T02D1373:240a-14: rnal 'byor pa 'di ni yum shes rab kyi pha
T02D1373:240a-15: rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong bar yang brgya byin
T02D1373:240a-17: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
T02D1373:240a-18: 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1373:240a-19: phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed par 'dod
T02D1373:240a-20: pas gang la rnal 'byor du byed //
T02D1373:240a-21: rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1373:240a-22: de skad ces smras pa dang /
T02D1373:240a-23: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces smras so //
T02D1373:240a-24: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la koo shi ka gang
T02D1373:240a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal
T02D1373:240a-27: nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du bya'o //
T02D1373:240a-28: koo shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1373:240a-29: phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed par 'dod pas
T02D1373:240a-30: / bla gab med pa la rnal 'byor du bslab par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1373:240a-31: de la nam mkha' bla gab yod pa la /
T02D1373:240a-32: rnal 'byor pas rnam par mi rtog pa goms par bya ba dang /
T02D1373:240a-33: koo shi ka yang nam mkha' bla gab med pa
T02D1373:240a-34: la rnal 'byor pas rnam par mi rtog pa goms
T02D1373:240a-35: par bya'o // de la gang zhig nam mkha' la
T02D1373:240a-36: rnal 'byor du byed par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i
T02D1373:240a-37: spyod lam ni sngar gong du bstan zin to //
T02D1373:240a-38: bla gab yod pa'i rnal 'byor brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:240a-39: de la rnal 'byor pa dang po khyim chen po
T02D1373:240a-40: dpangs mtho ba'i phyogs thams cad zhal zhal byas pa
T02D1373:240b-0: / bu ga rta rnga yang @240b mi shong bar
T02D1373:240b-1: tshags bsdams la khyim che po'i nang du mun pa'i
T02D1373:240b-2: nam mkha' la dngos po thams cad la zhen pa'i
T02D1373:240b-3: sems cha phra mo tsam yang med bar yongs su
T02D1373:240b-4: / spangs bas / mun pa la kun nas dang
T02D1373:240b-5: bas yongs su brtags pas ni rnal 'byor pa de
T02D1373:240b-6: la dang po du ba la sogs pa'i rtags lnga
T02D1373:240b-7: mtshan mo'i sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:240b-8: rtog pa thams cad yongs spangs shing //
T02D1373:240b-9: nyin zhag gcig la rnam par brtag / de la rtags ni ma byung na //
T02D1373:240b-10: de tshe nga yi brdzun tshig yin //
T02D1373:240b-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dam pa'o //
T02D1373:240b-12: mig dag mi 'dzums pa ni mig gtsug tor la bltas te /
T02D1373:240b-13: smin ma bteg la kha gdangs pa'am /
T02D1373:240b-14: yang na btsums kyang rung ste /
T02D1373:240b-16: mi brkyang bar byas la rnal 'byor du bya'o //
T02D1373:240b-17: rdo rje'i lam du zhugs pa yis //
T02D1373:240b-18: zhes pa ni 'dir srog gi rlung rtsa dbus ma
T02D1373:240b-19: aa ba dh'u t'ir dbang med du bla ma'i man
T02D1373:240b-20: ngag gis zhugs pa ni stong pa nyid rnam par
T02D1373:240b-21: mi rtog pa las dbus mar zhugs pa'o //
T02D1373:240b-22: nam mkha' la zhen pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba
T02D1373:240b-23: ni bla gab yod pa la rnal 'byor pas mig
T02D1373:240b-24: btsums pa dang / rdo rje'i lam du zhugs pas stong pa las rtags du ba lta bu dang /
T02D1373:240b-28: dri ma med pa'i nam mkhar snang ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:240b-29: de ni khro bo gtsug tor rgyal po'i lta bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1373:240b-30: nyin mo'i rnal 'byor zhes pa ni bla gab med
T02D1373:240b-31: pa'i nam mkha' sprin med pa'i dangs pa la rnal
T02D1373:240b-32: 'byor byed pa ni rgyal po'i lta stangs zhes bya
T02D1373:240b-33: ba ni dper na rgyal po 'khor mi rnams kyi
T02D1373:240b-35: 'khor mi rnams kyis rgyal po la rgol ba la sogs pa mi nus te /
T02D1373:240b-36: rgyal po de yang 'khor rnams la 'jigs pa'am /
T02D1373:240b-38: spu zing zhes byed par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1373:240b-39: rgyal po de'ang 'khor mi rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
T02D1373:240b-41: rgyal po des kyang 'khor mi thams cad kyi rten dang stegs byed cing /
T02D1373:240b-42: rgyal po'i bya ba byed la rgyal srid sus kyang
T02D1373:241a-0: mi 'phrogs pa de bzhin du nyin mo'i rnal @241a
T02D1373:241a-1: * // 'byor byed pa'i rnal 'byor ba yang rgyal po dang 'dra ste /
T02D1373:241a-9: bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed de gtan 'byung bar ni 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:241a-10: des na rgyal po'i 'dug stangs dang khengs pa'i 'dug stangs zhes bya'o //
T02D1373:241a-11: sangs rgyas lnga bdag gzugs nyid ni //
T02D1373:241a-12: sgrub pa che la rnam par brtag / ces phyag na rdo rje'i stod 'grel las 'byung ngo //
T02D1373:241a-13: des ni nyin mo dang mchan mo'i rnal 'byor bshad zin to //
T02D1373:241a-14: da ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i lta stangs brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:241a-15: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i lta stangs zhes pa ni mig drang por blta ba ste /
T02D1373:241a-16: drang por bltas pas ni snying ga na gnyid log pa lta bu'i bdud rtsi gnas pa'o //
T02D1373:241a-17: rnal 'byor pa'i spyod lam ni mdun drang por mig
T02D1373:241a-18: mi 'dzums par rnal 'byor pas cir yang mi dmigs
T02D1373:241a-19: shing / cir yang mi rtog par dngos po thams
T02D1373:241a-20: cad yongs su spangs nas de nyid dang gzhan nyid
T02D1373:241a-21: du khams gang du yang mi len par brjod pa
T02D1373:241a-22: thams cad kyi yul las 'das pas gnas pa'o //
T02D1373:241a-23: des ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i lta stangs bshad zin to //
T02D1373:241a-24: da ni zhi ba lha'i 'dug stangs bshad par bya ste /
T02D1373:241a-25: lha'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02D1373:241a-26: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyi lte
T02D1373:241a-27: bar aa dmar po gcig gsal bar bsgoms shing bsams
T02D1373:241a-28: pa de la / gsang ba ye shes kyi me
T02D1373:241a-29: 'bar bar gyur bas lte ba'i aa la phog pas
T02D1373:241a-30: aa dro bar gyur pa dang /
T02D1373:241a-31: dro ba las kyang me 'bar bar gyur te /
T02D1373:241a-32: stong pa nyid kyi rtsa aa ba dh'u t'i nas yar zhugs nas rang gi phung po dang /
T02D1373:241a-35: dbang po lnga rnams bsregs pas thig le bzhir gyur to //
T02D1373:241a-36: thig le bzhi ni gzugs zhu bar gyur pa dang /
T02D1373:241a-37: khams zhu par gyur pa dang /
T02D1373:241a-38: skye mched zhu par gyur pa dang /
T02D1373:241a-39: dbang po zhu bar gyur pa'i thig le rnams so //
T02D1373:241a-41: bde gshegs lnga ni bsregs nas su //
T02D1373:241a-42: spyan ma la sogs lnga bsregs te //
T02D1373:241a-43: ham bsregs ri bod can las kyang //
T02D1373:241b-1: / lte ba zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo yin te gzhom du med pa'o //
T02D1373:241b-2: las zhes bya ba ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde bskyed pa'o //
T02D1373:241b-3: 'bar zhes ba ni 'dod chags kyi me /
T02D1373:241b-4: shes rab kyi chags pas rab tu 'bar bas dug gsum bsreg pa'o //
T02D1373:241b-5: tsanda la'i zhes bya ba ni bde ba myur du 'gugs par byed pas na gtum mo'o //
T02D1373:241b-6: bde gshegs lnga zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po dang /
T02D1373:241b-10: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
T02D1373:241b-11: de lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1373:241b-12: bag chags kyi lus yin pas ni bsregs pa kho na'o //
T02D1373:241b-13: spyan ma la sogs shes pa ni sa'i khams ni da ki na'i'o //
T02D1373:241b-15: me khams ni khanda ro ha'i'o //
T02D1373:241b-16: rlung gi khams ni r'u bi ni'o //
T02D1373:241b-17: nam mkha'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1373:241b-18: de rnams ni khams lnga yin te /
T02D1373:241b-20: bsreg pa ni spyan la sogs pa lha mo rnams so //
T02D1373:241b-21: lnga zhes pa ni skye mched lnga yin te /
T02D1373:241b-26: lus kyi skye mched dang lnga bsregs pa'o //
T02D1373:241b-27: bsregs pa'i sgras ni mig gi dbang po dang /
T02D1373:241b-32: yid kyi dbang po ste de rnams bsregs shing med par byas /
T02D1373:241b-33: rnal 'byor ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D1373:241b-34: bag chags ngan ba zhen pa dang bcas pa'i dngos
T02D1373:241b-35: po rnams la chags par byed pa 'dir bsregs pa
T02D1373:241b-36: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ba'i sems kyi snang ba'o
T02D1373:241b-37: // yang dag par ni bsregs pa dang mi bsreg
T02D1373:241b-38: pa gang yang yod pa ni ma yin no zhes
T02D1373:241b-40: ste zhes pa ni bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag
T02D1373:241b-41: gis zin pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis gyis shig
T02D1373:241b-42: pa'o // ham zhes pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas brtsams te /
T02D1373:241b-43: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i bar du thug pa'i yi ge a'a li dang k'a li rnams bsregs shing /
T02D1373:241b-44: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1373:242a-1: 'dab ma brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug bo thams cad bsregs shing med par byas pa'o //
T02D1373:242a-2: ri bong zhes pa ni gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1373:242a-3: la gnas pa'i thig le bzhi ham dang bcas pa'i
T02D1373:242a-4: tshes bcu gcig gi zla ba lta bu'i rang bzhin
T02D1373:242a-5: du bzhu nas / lte ba gzhom du med par
T02D1373:242a-6: thim par gyur cing 'dres pa'i bde ba dang bcas
T02D1373:242a-7: du bzhu nas / par gnas pa'o // can zhes
T02D1373:242a-8: pa ni gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo dus thams cad
T02D1373:242a-9: du gnas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1373:242a-10: kyang zhes pa ni thams cad bzhu nas gzhom du med pa la thim pa'o //
T02D1373:242a-11: gzhom du med pa de nyid kyang zhu par 'gyur pas shin tu cha phra bar gyur cing /
T02D1373:242a-12: skra'i rtse mo brgya stong du gshags pa'i tshad du
T02D1373:242a-13: yang mi dmigs shing ma zhe na pa ni zhi
T02D1373:242a-14: ba lha'i gzugs su bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i
T02D1373:242a-15: don to // des ni lha'i gzugs kyi bsgom pa bshad zin to //
T02D1373:242a-16: yang lha'i gzugs kyi bsgom pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:242a-17: rnal 'byor bas shes rab kyi padma'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa bsam nas /
T02D1373:242a-18: dngos po thams cad rjod par byed pa'i nus pa 'di la yod pas /
T02D1373:242a-19: bdag nyid kyis kyang nus pa de btsal par byed
T02D1373:242a-20: pa'i don 'di la nus pa yod do bsams nas
T02D1373:242a-21: ; chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus na gnas pa'i ge sar yi ge ra'i rnam pa lta bu'am /
T02D1373:242a-22: yi ge a'i rnam pa lta bu de thabs kyi
T02D1373:242a-23: gsang ba'i rdo rje'i nang du btsud pas chos kyi
T02D1373:242a-24: 'byung gnas kyi aa de rdo rjes phyed mar bcad
T02D1373:242a-25: pas // g-yon pa ram du gyur nas drod skyed par bsam mo //
T02D1373:242a-26: g-yas pa yam du gyur nas rlung gi rang bzhin du gyur te /
T02D1373:242a-28: rlung gis ram la phag pas dro bar gyur nas
T02D1373:242a-29: dro ba las kyang me'i rang bzhin dro bar gyur
T02D1373:242a-30: te / chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi rang bzhin aa dros nas me 'bar bas /
T02D1373:242a-31: gsang ba'i rdo rje nor bu'i spu gu'i nang na
T02D1373:242a-32: yar tsanda l'i zhugs nas 'khor lo drug dang bcas
T02D1373:242a-33: pa'i rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1373:242a-39: lam gyi dbang po'i bya ba la sogs pa thams cad ba sregs shing /
T02D1373:242b-0: @242b med par byas nas bde ba dang bcas pa rang bzhin med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1373:242b-1: yang shes rab mas bsam pa ni //
T02D1373:242b-2: thabs kyi gsang ba rdo rje dung can ma nas
T02D1373:242b-3: padma'i bya gdong ma'i dbus su zhugs nas yar zla
T02D1373:242b-4: ba'i rnag bzhin bsil ba'i rlung aa ba dh'u t'i
T02D1373:242b-5: nas 'thon nas 'khor lo drug la sogs pa bsregs
T02D1373:242b-6: shing med par byas pa ni snga ma dang mthun
T02D1373:242b-7: no // de ltar thabs dang shes rab gnyis //
T02D1373:242b-8: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba de nyid la //
T02D1373:242b-9: dmigs shing sems gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral nas /
T02D1373:242b-10: bde ba de nyid la brten cing stong pa nyid
T02D1373:242b-11: dang snying rje dbyer mi phyed par gnyis su med
T02D1373:242b-12: par rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa ni chags pa'i lam
T02D1373:242b-13: pa'i zhi ba / lha'i gzugs su bsgom pa'o //
T02D1373:242b-14: chags pa'i lam pa'i rnal 'byor bshad zin to //
T02D1373:242b-15: da ni rtags rnams brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:242b-16: nyin mo'i rnal 'byor gyi rtags rnam pa drug ni gsang ba'i gsang ba yin te /
T02D1373:242b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'jam dpal glu'i le'ur gsungs so //
T02D1373:242b-19: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02D1373:242b-20: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D1373:242b-21: 'od chen rnam par snang mdzad pa //
T02D1373:242b-22: ye shes 'od zer lha ma me ba //
T02D1373:242b-23: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
T02D1373:242b-24: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02D1373:242b-25: rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags mchog / gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02D1373:242b-27: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02D1373:242b-28: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D1373:242b-29: zhes pa ni sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la rnal
T02D1373:242b-30: 'byor pas bsgoms pas 'bar ba lta bur rnal 'byor
T02D1373:242b-31: pas mthong ba'o // 'od chen rnam par snang mdzad pa //
T02D1373:242b-32: ye shes 'od zer lham me ba //
T02D1373:242b-33: zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba lta bur rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:242b-34: 'gro ba'i mar me zhes pa ni nyin mo'i dkyil
T02D1373:242b-35: 'khor ni 'gro ba rnams la mar me dang 'dra
T02D1373:242b-37: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba lta bur rnal 'byor bas mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:242b-38: ye shes sgron zhes pa ni rdo rje'i sgra gcan
T02D1373:242b-39: sems rang gis rtogs pa ni rang gi ye shes
T02D1373:243a-1: la sgron ma dang 'dra ste ye shes sgron ma dang /
T02D1373:243a-2: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis 'ja' tshon lta bur mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:243a-3: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02D1373:243a-4: zhes bya ba ni mchog gi cha ste glog lta bu yin te /
T02D1373:243a-5: kha dog dmar po 'khyug pa myur bar snang zhing mi rtag par mthong ba'o ;
T02D1373:243a-6: / rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags mchog / ces
T02D1373:243a-7: pa ni thig le kha dog rnam lngar snang zhing
T02D1373:243a-8: shin tu cha phra bar rnal 'byor bas mthong ba'o
T02D1373:243a-9: // de ltar rtags dang mtshan ma bcu gcig rnal
T02D1373:243a-10: 'byor pas mthong ba ni bcu gcig slob dpon las
T02D1373:243a-11: // thob cing / bzhi pa rnal 'byor pas nyams su myong zhing /
T02D1373:243a-12: nyams su blangs pas che 'di la 'bras bu sa
T02D1373:243a-13: bcu gcig thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni bcom ldan
T02D1373:243a-14: 'das kyis rgyud thams cad las kyang gsungs la /
T02D1373:243a-15: dpal mchog gi dang po'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis
T02D1373:243a-16: par bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs te
T02D1373:243a-17: / bum pa'i dbang bskur sa brgyad yin //
T02D1373:243a-18: gsang pa'i dbang bskur sa dgu pa //
T02D1373:243a-19: shes rab ye shes bcu yin te //
T02D1373:243a-20: bzhi pa bcu gcig sa bar bshad //
T02D1373:243a-22: de bzhin du yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi mar ni /
T02D1373:243a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i rnal 'byor gyi rtags lnga gsungs so //
T02D1373:243a-24: sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'jam dpal rdo rje'i glu'i le'ur ni /
T02D1373:243a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis nyin mo'i rnal 'byor rtags rnam pa drug gsungs so //
T02D1373:243a-26: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02D1373:243a-27: ces ba ni bum pa dang /
T02D1373:243a-29: re lde la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs rnal 'byor ba'i yid kyi shes pa la mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:243a-30: de'i dbus su zhes pa ni thig le'i dbus su
T02D1373:243a-31: sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
T02D1373:243a-32: / dpe byad brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku mthong ba
T02D1373:243a-33: de ni rnal 'byor ba des yid kyis yin gyi
T02D1373:243a-34: mig gis ni ma yin no //
T02D1373:243a-35: phyi nas mig gis kyang mthong la /
T02D1373:243a-36: yid kyis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:243a-37: yul dang rnam par bral zhes pa ni rdzas su med pas gzung zhing dpyad du med pa /
T02D1373:243b-0: brtags ma yin pa'i longs spyod @243b rdzogs pa'i sku
T02D1373:243b-1: dum rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyis zhal mthong bar
T02D1373:243b-2: 'gyur ro // des na rnal 'byor ba des sku'i
T02D1373:243b-3: sbyor bas mi shigs pa'i sgra dang nam mkha' la
T02D1373:243b-4: bdag nyid kyi rna bas chos kyi sgra thos par
T02D1373:243b-5: 'gyur ro // 'gyur ro // yang nam mkha'i dkyil
T02D1373:243b-6: na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos 'chad cing bzhugs
T02D1373:243b-8: mig gis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:243b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nam mkha'i dkyil na nyan
T02D1373:243b-10: thos kyi 'khor bye ba brgya stong dang lhan cig
T02D1373:243b-11: tu 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i yul rnams mthong bar
T02D1373:243b-12: 'gyur ngo ; / de ltar rnal 'byor bas gzugs
T02D1373:243b-13: su snang ba mthong ba ni rnal 'byor ba la
T02D1373:243b-15: sgrar rnal 'byor pa la snang ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1373:243b-16: mig gis mthong ba ni chos kyi sku yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1373:243b-17: des ni phyi'i rtags bshad pa'o //
T02D1373:243b-18: da ni nang gi rtags brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:243b-19: 'dir ni nyin mo'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1373:243b-20: chu 'dzin dang ni bral ba yi //
T02D1373:243b-21: nam mkha' brtan por ba lta ba yis //
T02D1373:243b-23: snga dro dang ni phyi dro yang //
T02D1373:243b-24: thun gnyis su ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1373:243b-25: snga dro nyi ma rgyab phyogs te //
T02D1373:243b-26: phyi dro yang ni de bzhin no //
T02D1373:243b-27: dmigs pa brtan par rab bya zhing //
T02D1373:243b-28: gzhan du na ni nyi ma yis //
T02D1373:243b-29: rab rib can du 'gyur bar bshad //
T02D1373:243b-30: de yi gnod ba bsal byas te //
T02D1373:243b-31: nyin zhag so sor lta ba'o //
T02D1373:243b-32: ji srid thig le'i nang du ni //
T02D1373:243b-33: ri mo nag po skra yi tshad //
T02D1373:243b-35: dus kyi rdzas ni mthong ba yin //
T02D1373:243b-38: de la tshig bcu gnyis ni sngar bstan pas go sla'o //
T02D1373:243b-39: ji srid thig le'i du ni //
T02D1373:243b-40: zhes bya ba ni lte bar zhu pa'i thig le'o //
T02D1373:243b-41: ri mo nag po zhes pa ni lte pa'i 'og sbun na gu'i mtshams na /
T02D1373:243b-42: don dam par byang chub kyi sems kha dog gnag pa mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:243b-43: skra'i tshad ces pa ni shin tu phra ba /
T02D1373:243b-44: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid yin pas shin tu gnag pa'o //
T02D1373:244a-1: gcig par gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244a-2: ba thag brkyang ba lta bu'am /
T02D1373:244a-3: dar dkar gyi skud pa brkyang ba lta bu mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:244a-4: dri ma med pa zhes pa ni lus dri ma med pa dang /
T02D1373:244a-5: ngag dri ma med pa dang /
T02D1373:244a-6: yid dri ma med pa dang /
T02D1373:244a-7: ye shes dri ma med par gyur bas na dri ma med pa'o //
T02D1373:244a-8: 'od 'phro pa zhes pa ni shes pa shel sgong
T02D1373:244a-9: phyis pa ltar dangs shing gsal ba ni 'od 'phro
T02D1373:244a-10: ba'o // dus kyi zhes pa ni don dam pa
T02D1373:244a-11: byang chub kyi sems dang kun gzhi 'grogs nas chos
T02D1373:244a-13: rdzas ni zhes pa ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems don dam pa la thim pa'o //
T02D1373:244a-14: mthong ba ni zhes pa ni don dam pa'i byang
T02D1373:244a-15: chub kyi sems 'byung ba bzhis ma bskyed pa'i gzhom
T02D1373:244a-16: du med pa lte ba'i 'og tu mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:244a-17: 'og tu mthong ba'i sgras ni kun rdzob byang chub
T02D1373:244a-18: kyi sems smin mtshams su kha dog dkar po'i rnam
T02D1373:244a-19: par mthong ba'o // de mthong bas 'od gsal go 'phang ni //
T02D1373:244a-20: rnal 'byor ba yis mthong gyur ba'o //
T02D1373:244a-22: de yang dbu ma'i rtsa aa ba dh'u t'ir yid chud pa'i rnal 'byor bas mthong ba yin te /
T02D1373:244a-23: yid ma chud pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1373:244a-24: de ltar mthong ba'i rnal 'byor ba de ni rnam
T02D1373:244a-25: pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku des ni khams gsum
T02D1373:244a-26: ma lus pa skyu ru ra lag mthil du bzhag
T02D1373:244a-27: pa bzhin du thams cad sa ler mkhyen pa'o //
T02D1373:244a-28: chu nang nyi ltar rab snang ba //
T02D1373:244a-29: dri ma med pa'i sna tshogs mdog / rnam pa kun du rang gi sems //
T02D1373:244a-30: gzhan gyi sems min rang gi sems //
T02D1373:244a-31: rang gi sems yin bde pa nyid ;
T02D1373:244a-32: / gzhan gyi sems min bde ba yin //
T02D1373:244a-33: yul dang rnam par bral ba yin //
T02D1373:244a-34: rang bde yid kyi nyams myong ba //
T02D1373:244a-35: gzhan gyi sems bde chen po'i phyir //
T02D1373:244a-36: bde ba bstan du mi btub bo //
T02D1373:244a-38: 'dir dang po rang gi sems kyi snang ba'i de
T02D1373:244a-39: bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad stong mthong
T02D1373:244a-40: bar 'gyur ro // lha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis stong mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244a-41: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi spyan rnam par dag pas dpag tshad stong mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244a-42: de bzhin du chos yang dag par sdud par spyan lnga bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1373:244b-1: rim pa bzhin du sha'i spyan dang /
T02D1373:244b-5: ye shes kyi spyan rnams rnal 'byor bas sems aa
T02D1373:244b-6: ba dh'u t'ir btsud cing bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'byung
T02D1373:244b-7: bar 'gyur ro // de nas thams cad mkhyen pas ma gzigs pa dang /
T02D1373:244b-8: ma mkhyen pa cung zad kyang med do //
T02D1373:244b-9: de ltar rnal 'byor bas srog gi rlung zhes pa
T02D1373:244b-10: ni dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya bdun cu
T02D1373:244b-11: rtsa lnga dbu mar chud nas /
T02D1373:244b-12: sna bug g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la rnal 'byor ba rnams la mi rgyun /
T02D1373:244b-13: phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor ba bsgoms pa'i stobs
T02D1373:244b-14: kyis dbugs brgyad brgya rnal 'byor bas 'gog par 'gyur
T02D1373:244b-15: ro // de ltar rnal 'byor bas 'gog na ni sa dang po thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244b-16: de la ye shes dang 'bras bu ni sha'i spyan rnam par dag pa thob /
T02D1373:244b-17: mthong ba ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244b-18: 'pho ba gnyis pa 'gog pas sa gnyis pa thob ste /
T02D1373:244b-19: phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten gyi khams gnyis tshun chad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244b-20: 'pho ba gsum pa 'gog pas sa gsum lha'i spyan
T02D1373:244b-21: rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa sa gsum
T02D1373:244b-23: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244b-24: 'pho ba bzhi pa 'gog pas sa bzhi ba thob par 'gyur te /
T02D1373:244b-25: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad tshun tshang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244b-26: 'pho ba lnga ba 'gog pas sa lnga ba sangs
T02D1373:244b-27: rgyas kyi spyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das
T02D1373:244b-29: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu drug mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:244b-30: 'pho ba drug pa srog gi rlung khri brgyad pa
T02D1373:244b-31: brgya sum cu rtsa phyed dang brgyad 'gog par 'gyur
T02D1373:244b-32: na ni / sa drug pa thob pas phyogs bcu'i
T02D1373:244b-33: 'jig rten gyi khams sum cu rtsa gnyis mthong bar
T02D1373:244b-34: na ni / 'gyur ro // 'pho ba bdun pa'i
T02D1373:244b-35: srog gi rlung 'grogs pas ni sa bdun pa thob
T02D1373:244b-37: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams drug cu rtsa bzhi'i
T02D1373:244b-39: sa de rnams thob ces pa ni byis pa rnams gzhug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:245a-1: yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gzhug pa'i phyir yin no //
T02D1373:245a-2: yang dag pa'i don ni ma yin no //
T02D1373:245a-3: de yang bshad na chu dang cod pan gnyis kyis
T02D1373:245a-4: sku'i zhal nas dbang bskur bas lus kyi sgrib pa
T02D1373:245a-5: dag par byas nas sa gnyis par lung bstan to
T02D1373:245a-6: // dar dpyangs dang rdo rje dril bu gnyis kyis
T02D1373:245a-7: gsung gi zhal nas dbang bskur bas ngag gi sgrib
T02D1373:245a-8: pa dag par byas nas sa bzhi pa thob par
T02D1373:245a-9: // 'gyur ro // brtul zhugs dad ming gi dbang
T02D1373:245a-10: thugs kyi zhal nas bskur bas ni yid kyi sgrib
T02D1373:245a-11: pa dag par byas nas sa drug pa thob par
T02D1373:245a-13: gnang ba ni ye shes kyi zhal nas dbang bskur
T02D1373:245a-14: bas ni ye shes kyi sgrib pa dag par byas
T02D1373:245a-15: nas sa bdun par lung bstan zhing thob par 'gyur
T02D1373:245a-16: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten kun rdzob tu byis
T02D1373:245a-17: pa rnams gzhug pa'i phyir yin no //
T02D1373:245a-18: 'pho ba brgyad pa'i srog gi rlung 'gog pas kyang sa brgyad pa thob la /
T02D1373:245a-19: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pas kyang sa brgyad pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:245a-20: sa brgyad pa thob pa'i mngon par shes pa ni
T02D1373:245a-21: shes rab kyi spyan gyi rnam par dag pa mi'i
T02D1373:245a-22: las 'das pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pas
T02D1373:245a-23: ni phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten gyi khams brgya nyi shu
T02D1373:245a-24: rtsa brgyad kyi mtha' tshun chad 'thob par 'gyur ro
T02D1373:245a-25: ; /'pho ba dgu pa'i srog gi rlung rgyu ba 'gog pas sa dgu pa thob la /
T02D1373:245a-26: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pas kyang sa dgu pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:245a-27: mngon par shes pa las ni shes rab kyi spyan rnam par dag pa thob pas /
T02D1373:245a-28: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nyi sa brgya lnga
T02D1373:245a-29: bcu rtsa drug gi mtha' tshun chad mthong bar 'gyur
T02D1373:245a-30: ro // 'pho ba bcu pa'i srog gi rlung rgyu ba 'gog pas sa bcu pa thob cing /
T02D1373:245a-31: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas
T02D1373:245a-32: kyang sa bcu pa ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang
T02D1373:245a-33: mtshungs te / mngon par shes pa ni ye shes
T02D1373:245a-34: kyi spyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa
T02D1373:245a-35: mtshungs te / thob ste / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
T02D1373:245a-36: gyi khams lnga brgya dang bcu gnyis kyi mtha' tshun
T02D1373:245a-38: 'pho ba bcu gcig pa'i srog gi rlung rgyu ba 'gog pas bcu gcig pa thob la /
T02D1373:245a-39: dbang bzhi ba 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang thob
T02D1373:245b-0: pas kyang sa bcu gcig sangs rgyas @245b kyis ste
T02D1373:245b-2: mngon par shes pa las ye shes kyi spyan lnga thob la /
T02D1373:245b-3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag gcig dang /
T02D1373:245b-4: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i mtha' tshun chad mthong par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:245b-5: 'pho bcu gnyis pa srog gi rlung rgyu ba nyi
T02D1373:245b-6: khri chig stong chen po'i 'jig rten drug brgya bdun
T02D1373:245b-7: cu rtsa lnga'i srog gi rlung gtsug tor gyi 'khor
T02D1373:245b-9: sa bcu gsum pa tshe 'di nyid kho nar dngos
T02D1373:245b-10: su brnyes te rdo rje 'chang gis thob pa ni
T02D1373:245b-11: de bzhin du stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi
T02D1373:245b-12: khams dang / stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
T02D1373:245b-13: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D1373:245b-14: dang gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
T02D1373:245b-15: gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dpag tu med pa
T02D1373:245b-16: dang / brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams mthong ba
T02D1373:245b-17: ni ye shes kyi spyan mnga' bas mthong bar 'gyur
T02D1373:245b-18: dang / ro // stong chung du zhes pa ni
T02D1373:245b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i khongs su chud pas
T02D1373:245b-20: dang / ro // ni / 'dir bshad kyang grub
T02D1373:245b-21: pa las la sgrub pa'i skyon du 'gyur bas 'dir
T02D1373:245b-22: dang / ro // ni / ma smos so / //
T02D1373:245b-23: / des ni nang gi rtags rnams bshad zin to //
T02D1373:245b-24: da ni sna tshogs gzugs kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:245b-25: sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dir stong
T02D1373:245b-26: pa nyid kyi snang ba ni sa'i rnam par mthong
T02D1373:245b-27: yang sra ba ni ma yin te /
T02D1373:245b-29: zhu ba chu'i lus su snang ba yin yang chu min te /
T02D1373:245b-32: de ltar me'i rnam par snang yang me ma yin te /
T02D1373:245b-33: sreg pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:245b-34: g-yo ba rlung gi lus 'dra yang rlung ni min no //
T02D1373:245b-35: gang g-yo ba'i rdzas su med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:245b-36: rdzas su med pa'i phyir stong pa'i rnam pa yin
T02D1373:245b-37: yang mthong ste zhes pa ni sgyu ma'i grong khyer
T02D1373:245b-38: bzhin du'o // dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan yang kha dog kyang ma yin te /
T02D1373:245b-39: rdzas su med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:245b-40: rnam pa kun du ldan yang thams cad du byis pa rnams kyis ma mthong ngo //
T02D1373:245b-41: de gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D1373:245b-42: nyon mongs bdud kyi stobs kyi mthus zhes pa ni
T02D1373:245b-43: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsar srog kun du spyod
T02D1373:245b-45: da ni mthar thug pa'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02D1373:245b-46: sku mthong ni nyin mtshan re //
T02D1373:245b-47: dus su srog gi rlung dag ni //
T02D1373:246a-2: 'gag pa ru ni rab tu bya //
T02D1373:246a-3: zhes pa ni bum pa can no //
T02D1373:246a-4: sku mthong nas ni zhes pa ni stong pa nyid
T02D1373:246a-5: rnam par mi rtog pa dngos po thams cad spangs
T02D1373:246a-6: pa bsgoms pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mthong ngo
T02D1373:246a-7: // nyin mtshan re zhes pa ni rnal 'byor bas
T02D1373:246a-8: bya ba thams cad spangs nas rnal 'byor bsgom pa'o
T02D1373:246a-9: // // dus su zhes pa ni thun brgyad du byas pa'i dus ma yol ba'o //
T02D1373:246a-10: srog gi rlung zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa dang
T02D1373:246a-11: g-yas pa la mi rgyu bar srog dbu ma la
T02D1373:246a-12: rgyu ba'o // dag ni zhes pa ni aa ba dh'u t'i ni dag pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D1373:246a-13: 'gag pa ru ni zhes pa ni lte ba'i 'og
T02D1373:246a-14: tu rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i gnas gsang ba bde ba
T02D1373:246a-15: bskyed pa'i nus pa yod pa can du /
T02D1373:246a-16: yi ge ksha'am aa shad lta bus kun rdzob byang
T02D1373:246a-17: chub kyi sems dang shes pa thur du 'gror mi
T02D1373:246a-19: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni nam mkha'i
T02D1373:246a-20: gdong can ma'i khar ni yi ge ham mgo thur
T02D1373:246a-22: dbus ma'i rtsa aa ba dh'u t'i nag por gnas
T02D1373:246a-23: pa'i nang du ye shes kyi dar dmar po'i rgyun
T02D1373:246a-24: dang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid de dang /
T02D1373:246a-25: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa 'dres nas yar 'gro
T02D1373:246a-26: ba ni yi ge ham gis 'gog par byed cing
T02D1373:246a-28: ham zhu bas 'gog pa yin te /
T02D1373:246a-29: ma zhu bas ma yin la /
T02D1373:246a-32: de bzhin du 'og tu 'gro ba ni yi ge
T02D1373:246a-33: ksha sa 'gog pa'i phyir mi thar bar yar breng
T02D1373:246a-34: mar breng gnas pa ni khams bde ba'i rtsa lta
T02D1373:246a-35: bu'am / pi wang gi rgyud sbreng ba lta bur
T02D1373:246a-36: gnas par bsam pa ni dbu mar yid gzung ba'i
T02D1373:246a-38: rab tu bya zhes pa ni rnal 'byor bas yang
T02D1373:246a-39: nas yang 'bad pas bya zhes pa'i don to zhes
T02D1373:246a-40: bya ba ni rnal 'byor ba'i don to //
T02D1373:246a-41: bum pa zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i padma'i sna rtse dang /
T02D1373:246a-47: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i ham rnams ni bum pa'o //
T02D1373:246a-48: can zhes pa ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems thig le'i rang bzhin gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1373:246a-50: sna tshogs kyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1373:246a-51: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas 'khor lo drug tu
T02D1373:246a-52: khyab cing bde bas lus thams cad tshim par byed
T02D1373:246a-53: pa can no // ji srid du ni 'khor bzhin ma //
T02D1373:246a-54: rang gi lus la yongs bskor ba //
T02D1373:246b-0: sngon gsungs @246b sku la rang gi yin //
T02D1373:246b-1: des ni zla drug reg spangs bde //
T02D1373:246b-2: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug bral ba'o //
T02D1373:246b-4: ji srid ces ni sgom pa'i dus su rnal 'byor ba la 'byung ba'o //
T02D1373:246b-5: 'khor bzhin ma zhes pa ni 'khor lo ltar 'khor bar snang ba'o //
T02D1373:246b-6: rang gi lus la zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa
T02D1373:246b-7: bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pa'i dus su yang khyad
T02D1373:246b-9: yongs 'khor ba zhes pa ni lus thams cad la gnas phyogs nas bskor bar mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:246b-11: zhes pa ni 'od dkar po skya rengs shar ba lta bus bdag nyid la bskor ba mthong ba'o //
T02D1373:246b-12: sngon gsungs pa'i sku la zhes pa ni sna tshogs kyis dus su mthong ba'i sku'o //
T02D1373:246b-13: des ni zla ba drug reg ces pa ni srog
T02D1373:246b-14: gi rlung zla ba drug gi bar du gnyis log
T02D1373:246b-15: rtsa lag pas mi drag pa tsam du mnan cing
T02D1373:246b-16: bkag na / mi 'pho ba'i bde ba'i dbang bo
T02D1373:246b-17: gnyis kyi spros pa las byung ba'i bde ba bcu
T02D1373:246b-18: drug char yang mi phod pa'i bde ba skye bar
T02D1373:246b-20: spangs shing bde zhes pa ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1373:246b-21: ye shes kyi phyag rgya spangs pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D1373:246b-22: po bsgom pa'i bde ba yin zhes pa'i don to
T02D1373:246b-23: // spangs zhes pa ni sdug bsngal dang bcas pa'i bsrub pa dang /
T02D1373:246b-24: g-yo ba la sogs pa'i bde ba spangs pa'o //
T02D1373:246b-25: bde bar 'gyur zhes pa ni phan tshun du thabs
T02D1373:246b-26: dang shes rab gnyis mi 'pho ba'i bde ba ni
T02D1373:246b-27: mi 'dzag pa'i bde ba 'khor bar skye ba'i rgyu
T02D1373:246b-28: med pas ni mi 'dzag pa'i bde ba'i zhes pa
T02D1373:246b-29: ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so //
T02D1373:246b-30: da ni rnal 'byor nye bar sdud pa brjod par bya ste /

T02D1373:246b-37: ro // do // de nas nyi mar bcas song ba //

T02D1373:246b-41: zhes pa ni g-yas pa dang g-yon par srog 'gro

T02D1373:247a-1: kun du blang ba'o zhes bya'o //

T02D1373:247a-4: bya zhes ni skad cig gis bya'o //

T02D1373:247a-7: bde bar 'phel ba'i don du bya yis ltung ba'i
T02D1373:247a-10: sa bon mi gtong ba bde ba //

T02D1373:247a-13: zhes pa ni bzhi pa ye shes kyi rdo rje

T02D1373:247a-15: pa'i nges pa'o // da ni sngom brtson 'bras bu brjod par bya ste /

T02D1373:247a-17: stong pa nyid kyi gzugs kyi zhes pa ni thabs
T02D1373:247a-18: dang shes rab gnyis gcig phan tshun stong pa nyid

T02D1373:247a-21: dge tshul rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1373:247a-22: dge slong ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1373:247a-23: dge tshul ma rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams ni sdom brtson no //

T02D1373:247a-26: ba'i don to // rnams kyi shes pa ni tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen dang /
T02D1373:247a-28: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dge bsnyen
T02D1373:247a-29: pho mo rnams la ni dam tshig 'di rnams sbyin
T02D1373:247a-30: par bya'o // so so'i skye bo khyim pa rnams la ni sbyin par bya ba ma yin te /
T02D1373:247a-32: khyim pa rnams ni bya ba mang bas sgrub par byed pa'i gus pa dang mi ldan te /

T02D1373:247a-34: gyur zhing dam pa'i chos spong ba'i rgyu bsags pas
T02D1373:247a-35: sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las sogs
T02D1373:247a-36: so // des na khyim pa rnams la ni mi bstan zhes 'byung ngo //
T02D1373:247a-37: de la dge slong la sogs pa tshangs par spyod
T02D1373:247a-38: pa la gnas pa rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i bya
T02D1373:247a-39: ba kha na ma thob pa'i las kyi bya ba

T02D1373:247a-43: dge slong la sogs pa tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams la bstan par bya'o //

T02D1373:247b-6: nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba //
T02D1373:247b-7: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //

T02D1373:247b-9: 'dod chags bral pas dbang po thul //

T02D1373:247b-33: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //

T02D1373:247b-40: sdom pa brtson zhes pa ni so sor thar pa'i
T02D1373:247b-41: sdom pa dang ldan pa ni sdom brtson zhes bya'o
T02D1373:247b-42: // so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni byang chub

T02D1373:247b-45: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni gsang sngags kyi dam tshig tu 'gyur ro //

T02D1373:247b-47: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ni zag pa med pa ste /

T02D1373:247b-51: dngos po la reg pa med pas nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:247b-52: zhig ce na mi 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1373:247b-53: de yang skad cig ma gcig mngon par rdzogs par
T02D1373:247b-54: byang chub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid kyis rang
T02D1373:247b-55: bzhin gyis rtog pa'i skad cig ma la /

T02D1373:248a-1: skad cig ma bco lnga dang /
T02D1373:248a-2: bcu drug ma byung ba'i bar ni skad cig ma'o //
T02D1373:248a-3: chags pa zhes pa ni dkar po'i phyogs tshes gcig nas brtsams pa'i nya'o //
T02D1373:248a-4: de'i mthar song ba ni bcu drug ba'i dbang po skad cig ma'i cha'i mtshan nyid zhugs pa'o //
T02D1373:248a-5: chags bral zhes pa ni nag po'i phyogs kyi skad cig ma gnyis pa la zhugs pa'o ;

T02D1373:248a-7: po'i phyogs la ma zhugs pa de ni mngon par

T02D1373:248a-9: par sbyor ba'i gsal ba rang la skyes pa shes

T02D1373:248a-30: srog gi rlung grangs sum stong drug brgya'i skad cig
T02D1373:248a-31: ma la dmigs shing yar 'then nas bde ba 'phel
T02D1373:248a-32: bar byas te / shes rab kyi padmar 'phros pas ni sa drug pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:248a-33: de bzhin du yang mgrin par srog gi rlung sum
T02D1373:248a-34: stong drug brgya'i skad cig ma'i bde ba 'phel bar
T02D1373:248a-35: byed cing / yar 'then nas shes rab kyi padmar
T02D1373:248a-36: phyir 'phro bar byed pas ni sa brgyad pa thob
T02D1373:248a-37: byed cing / par 'gyur ro // yang de bzhin
T02D1373:248a-38: du dpral bar srog gi rlung sum stong drug brgya'i
T02D1373:248a-39: skad cig ma la sems gtad cing /
T02D1373:248a-40: bde ba 'phel bar byed pa nis bcu ba thob par 'gyur ro //

T02D1373:248a-42: bzhi'i thig le rnams la sems gtad cing srog gi
T02D1373:248a-43: rlung nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i dbugs rnams thams
T02D1373:248a-44: cad der 'gog cing bde ba thams cad de ru
T02D1373:248b-0: bskyed cing rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis @248b
T02D1373:248b-1: bde ba'i ros rgyas shing bde ba 'phel bar byed
T02D1373:248b-2: pas ni sa bcu gnyis thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:248b-3: de ni mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa zhes bya ba yin te /
T02D1373:248b-4: gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba zhes pa ni /
T02D1373:248b-5: bde ba thams cad der bskyed cing des rgyas pas na gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1373:248b-6: steng nas 'bar ba'i bar du ni shes pa la de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1373:248b-7: aom dd'a nas ni 'bar ba'i bar //
T02D1373:248b-8: thig le bzhi ni bzhu pa yis //
T02D1373:248b-9: gsang ba'i bar du 'ongs pa ste //
T02D1373:248b-10: bzhi pa de bzhin skyed pa yin //
T02D1373:248b-12: aom dd'a zhes pa ni gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i 'dab ma bzhi pa'o //
T02D1373:248b-13: nas ni zhes pa ni dpral pa nas snying gar brgyud cing bde ba skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D1373:248b-14: 'bar ba'i bar zhes pa ni lte ba'i aa dmar
T02D1373:248b-15: po la bde ba skyed pa'i thig le bzhi zhes
T02D1373:248b-16: pa ni lus kyi thig le dang ngag gi thig
T02D1373:248b-17: le dang / yid kyi thig le dang /
T02D1373:248b-18: ye shes kyi thig le gnas pa'i //
T02D1373:248b-19: bzhu ba zhes pa ni shes rab kyi chags pas
T02D1373:248b-20: bzhu ba yis padma nas 'bar bas lus bzhu pa
T02D1373:248b-24: ye shes pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis snyoms
T02D1373:248b-25: par 'jug pa'i dus su dmigs pa'i yul khyad par
T02D1373:248b-27: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis so //
T02D1373:248b-28: gsang ba'i zhes pa ni rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i sum mdor aa ba dh'u t'i'i rtse mor ro ;

T02D1373:248b-33: bde ba byed cing ba spu'i gseb thams cad sim

T02D1373:248b-35: bzhi pa zhes pa ni sems gang du yang mi

T02D1373:248b-37: bral ba'i sems gnyug mar gnas pa shes pa gang
T02D1373:248b-39: rkyen dang ma phrad pa dang gal bar gnas pa

T02D1373:248b-42: rnal 'byor ba rnams ni dpes mtshon nas bzhi pa rnyed pa'o //

T02D1373:249a-0: slar @249a * // bskyed de ngan song du lhung

T02D1373:249a-4: nas grol ba la sogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur zhing bla
T02D1373:249a-5: na med pa'i byang chub mthong ni /
T02D1373:249a-8: bong bu la sogs pa dang /
T02D1373:249a-9: 'phyon ma rnams kyis kyang 'dod chags la longs spyod
T02D1373:249a-10: pas grol nas byang chub thob cing sangs rgyas par

T02D1373:249a-12: mi'i 'gyur te 'ching ba'i rgyur 'gyur zhing 'bras bu

T02D1373:249a-14: 'tshed pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1373:249a-15: de nas bla ma'i gdams ngag la shin tu yang gal che ste btsal bar bya'o //
T02D1373:249a-17: slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal gyi //
T02D1373:249a-18: rgya mtsho che las pha rol sgrol //
T02D1373:249a-19: yang na shin tu khyad par can //
T02D1373:249a-20: de dag de ni bla mar dbul //
T02D1373:249a-21: des na bla ma mnyes bya ste //
T02D1373:249a-23: bskyed pa zhes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag ji
T02D1373:249a-24: lta ba bzhin du gtum mo me'i rnam pa gsang
T02D1373:249a-25: ba'i dkyil 'khor nas bskyed nas phung po dang /
T02D1373:249a-26: khams dang skye mched dang dbang po dang las dang /
